Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-506-1', description='Kniha op\xc4\x9bt v prodeji.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\tobsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nToto je dvan\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kniha z Kryonovy s\xc3\xa9rie. Je to prvn\xc3\xad kniha sv\xc3\xa9ho druhu a mohla by zavr\xc5\xa1it v\xc3\xadce ne\xc5\xbe 20 let spolupr\xc3\xa1ce mezi Lee Carrollem a Kryonem. \r\n\r\nDNA je na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm chemick\xc3\xbdm pl\xc3\xa1nem (blueprintem), ale Projekt v\xc3\xbdzkumu lidsk\xc3\xa9ho genomu objevil, \xc5\xbee v\xc3\xadce ne\xc5\xbe devades\xc3\xa1t procent z n\xc3\xad nen\xc3\xad k\xc3\xb3dov\xc3\xa1no. Ve skute\xc4\x8dnosti pouze p\xc5\x99ibli\xc5\xben\xc4\x9b \xc4\x8dty\xc5\x99i procenta vytv\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99ej\xc3\xad 23 000 gen\xc5\xaf v lidsk\xc3\xa9m t\xc4\x9ble. A zbytek? To je naprost\xc3\xa1 h\xc3\xa1danka. Dodnes neexistuje odpov\xc4\x9b\xc4\x8f na to, pro\xc4\x8d v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1ina DNA nem\xc3\xa1 \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dnou symetrii \xc4\x8di k\xc3\xb3dy jak\xc3\xa9hokoli druhu. Vlastn\xc4\x9b se to zd\xc3\xa1 b\xc3\xbdt naprosto nahodil\xc3\xa9.\r\n\r\nKryon n\xc3\xa1m p\xc5\x99edal pln\xc4\x9b channelovan\xc3\xa9 vysv\xc4\x9btlen\xc3\xad. Je mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9, \xc5\xbee DNA tvo\xc5\x99\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99ev\xc3\xa1\xc5\xben\xc4\x9b kvantov\xc3\xa9 instrukce - informace, kter\xc3\xa9 hovo\xc5\x99\xc3\xad k lidsk\xc3\xa9mu t\xc4\x9blu? A pokud ano, co je v t\xc4\x9bchto instrukc\xc3\xadch? Bylo by mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9, aby v na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad DNA byl cel\xc3\xbd n\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1 ak\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1ick\xc3\xbd z\xc3\xa1znam? Co dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho by zde mohlo b\xc3\xbdt zastoupeno? Za\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadn\xc3\xa1 to d\xc3\xa1vat smysl a v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1ina ned\xc3\xa1vn\xc3\xbdch objev\xc5\xaf v kvantov\xc3\xa9 fyzice pouze roz\xc5\xa1i\xc5\x99uje potenci\xc3\xa1ly t\xc3\xa9to kvantov\xc3\xa9 molekuly. \r\n\r\nKryonovo \xc3\xbapln\xc3\xa9 odhalen\xc3\xad sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc3\xbdch dvan\xc3\xa1cti vrstev \xc4\x8di energi\xc3\xad DNA v\xc3\xa1m p\xc5\x99edkl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1me v t\xc3\xa9to knize. Jej\xc3\xad sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad je i p\xc5\x99edmluva badatele v oblasti DNA - Dr. Todda Ovokaityse, koment\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99e Lee Carrolla a tak\xc3\xa9 pln\xc4\x9b barevn\xc3\xa9, channelovan\xc3\xa9 ilustrace ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa9 vrstvy, kter\xc3\xa9 vytvo\xc5\x99il americko-izraelsk\xc3\xbd um\xc4\x9blec Elan Dubro-Cohen. \r\n\r\nTato kniha je ezoterick\xc3\xbdm pr\xc5\xaflomem. \r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTato kniha v\xc3\xa1m m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee zm\xc4\x9bnit \xc5\xbeivot. Zm\xc4\x9bnit \xc5\xbeivot v\xc2\xa0tom smyslu, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xa1m m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee pomoci s\xc2\xa0pozn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xadm sebe samotn\xc3\xbdch, sv\xc3\xbdch odv\xc4\x9bk\xc3\xbdch schopnost\xc3\xad, tvo\xc5\x99iv\xc3\xa9 s\xc3\xadly a\xc2\xa0chcete-li, tak i\xc2\xa0m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbeeme \xc5\x99\xc3\xadci, tvo\xc5\x99iv\xc3\xa9 moci. M\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbeete pochopit, k\xc3\xbdm ve\xc2\xa0skute\xc4\x8dnosti \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk jako lidsk\xc3\xa1 bytost je, odkud se\xc2\xa0bere, odkud p\xc5\x99ich\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad ta obrovsk\xc3\xa1 s\xc3\xadla, kterou ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xbd \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk disponuje, nicm\xc3\xa9n\xc4\x9b ji zat\xc3\xadm nevyu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1. Tak\xc3\xa9 se\xc2\xa0dozv\xc3\xadte, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0znalost o\xc2\xa0na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad DNA je t\xc3\xadm nejv\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm tajemstv\xc3\xadm, kter\xc3\xa1 se\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99ed lidstvem utajuj\xc3\xad, proto\xc5\xbee to p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadmo ohro\xc5\xbeuje postaven\xc3\xad elit \xc5\x99\xc3\xadd\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch \xc5\xbeivot na\xc2\xa0Zemi.\r\n\r\nKniha vznikla na\xc2\xa0podklad\xc4\x9b sd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99evzat\xc3\xbdch vnit\xc5\x99n\xc3\xad cestou, neboli tzv. channelingem od\xc2\xa0bytosti, je\xc5\xbe se\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99edstavuje jako Kryon. Je slo\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xa9 vysv\xc4\x9btlit, kdo je bytost Kryon, ale\xc2\xa0lze i\xc2\xa0s\xc2\xa0vyu\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm jeho vlastn\xc3\xadch slov \xc5\x99\xc3\xadci, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0je to and\xc4\x9blsk\xc3\xa1, miluj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad entita z\xc2\xa0Centr\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadho Slunce, kter\xc3\xa1 p\xc5\xafsob\xc3\xad v\xc2\xa0oblasti utv\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad planet a\xc2\xa0fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad podpory kolem fyzick\xc3\xa9 existence inkarnovan\xc3\xbdch bytost\xc3\xad \xe2\x80\x93 tady na\xc2\xa0Zemi n\xc3\xa1s lid\xc3\xad. Pod\xc3\xadlel se\xc2\xa0na\xc2\xa0vzniku planety Zem\xc4\x9b, v\xc2\xa0sou\xc4\x8dasnosti pom\xc3\xa1h\xc3\xa1 udr\xc5\xbeovat hodnoty magnetick\xc3\xa9 m\xc5\x99\xc3\xad\xc5\xbeky a\xc2\xa0podporuje fyziku v\xc2\xa0souvislosti s\xc2\xa0hmotn\xc3\xbdm \xc5\xbeivotem zde, v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b pomoci p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0zvy\xc5\xa1ov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad vibrac\xc3\xad planety na\xc2\xa0cest\xc4\x9b lidstva za\xc2\xa0\xc5\xbeivotem v\xc2\xa0m\xc3\xadru. \r\n\r\nSd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad Kryona se\xc2\xa0dost\xc3\xa1vaj\xc3\xad k\xc2\xa0lidem prost\xc5\x99ednictv\xc3\xadm Ameri\xc4\x8dana Lee Carrolla, kter\xc3\xa9ho Kryon vybral a\xc2\xa0vy\xc5\xa1kolil. To bylo v\xc2\xa0letech 1987\xe2\x80\x931991. Od\xc2\xa0t\xc3\xa9 doby Lee Carroll ve\xc5\x99ejn\xc4\x9b \xe2\x80\x9echanneluje\xe2\x80\x9c Kryona a\xc2\xa0jeho sd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad zve\xc5\x99ej\xc5\x88uje na\xc2\xa0sv\xc3\xa9m webu. Kryon takto p\xc5\x99edal velk\xc3\xa9 mno\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xad informac\xc3\xad nejen k\xc2\xa0na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad DNA.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0\xc5\x99\xc3\xadjnu 2004 vznikl prvn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99eklad Kryonova channelingu do\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8de\xc5\xa1tiny. Postupn\xc4\x9b p\xc5\x99ib\xc3\xbdvaly n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xa9 dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0od\xc2\xa0roku 2010 jsou Kryonova poselstv\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99ekl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1na pravideln\xc4\x9b a\xc2\xa0zve\xc5\x99ej\xc5\x88ov\xc3\xa1na na\xc2\xa0mnoha duchovn\xc4\x9b zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xbdch webech v\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8cR i\xc2\xa0SR. Za\xc2\xa0tu dobu si Kryonova poselstv\xc3\xad z\xc3\xadskala srdce lid\xc3\xad, kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad se\xc2\xa0probudili do\xc2\xa0sv\xc3\xa9 duchovnosti, a\xc2\xa0kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad je pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvaj\xc3\xad pro\xc2\xa0sv\xc5\xafj duchovn\xc3\xad r\xc5\xafst a\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xbdvoj. Sv\xc3\xbdm srdcem poznali, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0tato sd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad jsou \xc4\x8dist\xc3\xa1, jsou v\xc2\xa0l\xc3\xa1sce, respektuj\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0vedou ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa9ho \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99e k\xc2\xa0respektu k\xc2\xa0\xc5\xbeivotu a\xc2\xa0svobodn\xc3\xa9 v\xc5\xafli ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa9ho jednotliv\xc3\xa9ho \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bka.\r\n\r\nPr\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9b t\xc3\xa9mata lidsk\xc3\xa9 DNA a\xc2\xa0jej\xc3\xad historie, ot\xc3\xa1zky vzniku a\xc2\xa0historie lidsk\xc3\xa9 rasy na\xc2\xa0planet\xc4\x9b Zemi, mo\xc5\xbenost\xc3\xad skryt\xc3\xbdch v\xc2\xa0na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad DNA, kter\xc3\xa9 byly lidstvu na\xc2\xa0po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1tku jeho v\xc3\xbdvoje v\xc3\xbdznamn\xc4\x9b od\xc5\x88aty a\xc2\xa0d\xc3\xa1le pak zatajov\xc3\xa1ny, pat\xc5\x99\xc3\xad mezi \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99i a\xc2\xa0studenty Kryona k\xc2\xa0velmi obl\xc3\xadben\xc3\xbdm a\xc2\xa0\xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dan\xc3\xbdm. Prost\xc5\x99ednictv\xc3\xadm pozn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad lidsk\xc3\xa9 DNA a\xc2\xa0jej\xc3\xad energeticko-informa\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad kvantov\xc3\xa9 podstaty doch\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk k\xc2\xa0uv\xc4\x9bdom\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad si sv\xc3\xbdch mo\xc5\xbenost\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0pr\xc3\xa1va \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddit sv\xc5\xafj \xc5\xbeivot ve\xc2\xa0v\xc5\xa1ech jeho oblastech, v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b mo\xc5\xbenosti tvo\xc5\x99it a\xc2\xa0upravovat sv\xc3\xa9 zdrav\xc3\xad \xc4\x8di ovliv\xc5\x88ovat kvalitu sv\xc3\xa9ho \xc5\xbeivota. Z\xc2\xa0pohledu i\xc2\xa0dne\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xadho \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bka jde vlastn\xc4\x9b o\xc2\xa0kon\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1zrak\xc5\xaf. D\xc3\xadky tomu si \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk nakonec uv\xc4\x9bdom\xc3\xad i\xc2\xa0podstatu a\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xad\xc4\x8dinu sv\xc3\xa9 osobn\xc3\xad odpov\xc4\x9bdnosti za\xc2\xa0sv\xc5\xafj \xc5\xbeivot a\xc2\xa0tak\xc3\xa9 za\xc2\xa0\xc5\xbeivot n\xc3\xa1s v\xc5\xa1ech na\xc2\xa0planet\xc4\x9b. D\xc4\x9bjinn\xc3\xbdm obloukem se\xc2\xa0pak sv\xc3\xbdm p\xc5\x99i\xc4\x8din\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xadm, na\xc2\xa0podklad\xc4\x9b sv\xc3\xa9ho rozhodnut\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0sebepozn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0postupn\xc3\xbdm aktivov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xadm sv\xc3\xa9 DNA vrac\xc3\xad k\xc2\xa0mo\xc5\xbenosti \xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad \xc5\xbeivota, kter\xc3\xbd m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee pln\xc4\x9b pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xa1 DNA poskytnout. \r\n\r\nV\xc4\x9bdeck\xc3\xa1 obec ji\xc5\xbe mnoh\xc3\xa9 z\xc2\xa0t\xc4\x9bchto poznatk\xc5\xaf k\xc2\xa0na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad DNA sv\xc3\xbdmi postupy prok\xc3\xa1zala, ov\xc5\xa1em zat\xc3\xadm ne a\xc5\xbe\xc2\xa0v\xc2\xa0takov\xc3\xa9 \xc3\xbarovni, aby\xc2\xa0tyto skute\xc4\x8dnosti mohly b\xc3\xbdt vyu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1ny p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0l\xc3\xa9\xc4\x8den\xc3\xad, a\xc5\xa5 ji\xc5\xbe ve\xc2\xa0zdravotnick\xc3\xbdch za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xadch \xc4\x8di samotn\xc3\xbdmi lidmi. To v\xc5\xa1ak \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bka nestav\xc3\xad do\xc2\xa0pasivn\xc3\xad role. Naopak \xe2\x80\x93 pochopen\xc3\xadm Kryonem p\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xa1van\xc3\xa9ho pozn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad se\xc2\xa0m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xbd jednotliv\xc3\xbd \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk dostat k\xc2\xa0uchopen\xc3\xad sv\xc3\xa9ho \xc5\xbeivotn\xc3\xadho Mistrovstv\xc3\xad, na\xc2\xa0kter\xc3\xa9 m\xc3\xa1 ji\xc5\xbe od\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bk\xc5\xaf pr\xc3\xa1vo. Proto byla tato kniha, kter\xc3\xa1 je ve\xc2\xa0skute\xc4\x8dnosti 12. Kryonovou knihou, vybr\xc3\xa1na jako prvn\xc3\xad z\xc2\xa0Kryonov\xc3\xbdch knih k\xc2\xa0uveden\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8desk\xc3\xa9m kni\xc5\xben\xc3\xadm trhu.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - duben 2014 - ISBN 978-80-7300-506-1\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\tP\xc5\x99edmluva\r\n\t\xc3\x9avod\r\n\r\n\r\n\tNeviditeln\xc3\xa9 v\xc4\x9bci!\r\n\tJak to za\xc4\x8dalo\xe2\x80\xa6\r\n\tDNA zkouman\xc3\xa1 nov\xc3\xbdm zp\xc5\xafsobem\r\n\tV\xc4\x9bci, o kter\xc3\xbdch nikdo nep\xc5\x99em\xc3\xbd\xc5\xa1l\xc3\xad\r\n\tU\xc4\x8den\xc3\xad za\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadn\xc3\xa1\r\n\tDvan\xc3\xa1ct vrstev DNA\r\n\tDNA SKUPINA I \xe2\x80\x93 Vrstvy Jedna, Dv\xc4\x9b a T\xc5\x99i\r\n\tDNA SKUPINA II \xe2\x80\x93 Vrstvy \xc4\x8cty\xc5\x99i, P\xc4\x9bt a \xc5\xa0est\r\n\tDNA SKUPINA III \xe2\x80\x93 Vrstvy Sedm, Osm a Dev\xc4\x9bt\r\n\tDNA SKUPINA IV \xe2\x80\x93 Vrstvy Deset, Jeden\xc3\xa1ct a Dvan\xc3\xa1ct\r\n\tSHRNUT\xc3\x8d SKUPIN DNA a velk\xc3\xa9 d\xc4\x9bsiv\xc3\xa9 tajemstv\xc3\xad!\r\n\tAktivace pole DNA, Kryon v Boulderu v Coloradu (\xc5\xbeiv\xc3\xbd channeling)\r\n\tZa\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1tek aktivace specifick\xc3\xbdch energi\xc3\xad DNA, Kryon v Rize v Loty\xc5\xa1sku (\xc5\xbeiv\xc3\xbd channeling)\r\n\tD\xc4\x9bjiny DNA a lidsk\xc3\xa9 rasy, Kryon v Portlandu v Oregonu (\xc5\xbeiv\xc3\xbd channeling)\r\n\tVelk\xc3\xa1 v\xc4\x9bdeck\xc3\xa1 p\xc5\x99edpojatost, Kryon v Gaithersburgu v Marylandu (\xc5\xbeiv\xc3\xbd channeling)\r\n\tSou\xc4\x8dasn\xc3\xa9 ud\xc3\xa1losti\r\n\tKryonovy informace\r\n\tIlustrace dvan\xc3\xa1cti vrstev DNA \r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-504-7', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTato kniha je ur\xc4\x8dena v\xc5\xa1em z\xc3\xa1jemc\xc5\xafm o programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf \xc5\x99ady PIC32MX. D\xc5\xafraz je kladen na typ PIC32MX130F064B. V textu jsou interpretov\xc3\xa1ny a formou p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad\xc5\xaf p\xc5\x99edvedeny nejpodstatn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad periferie. Knihu pak lze pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadt pro sezn\xc3\xa1men\xc3\xad s mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry PIC32MX a budov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch aplikac\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99edpokl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1 se, \xc5\xbee \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 m\xc3\xa1 znalosti programovac\xc3\xadho jazyka C a orientujete se v z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch pojmech mikroprocesorov\xc3\xa9 techniky. Jako literaturu pro sezn\xc3\xa1men\xc3\xad s architekturou PIC lze doporu\xc4\x8dit: \r\nC pro mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry PIC - Pr\xc3\xa1ce s mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry PIC18F452 a PIC18F1220 v jazyce C.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola popisuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf PIC32MX, rozm\xc3\xadst\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf na pouzd\xc5\x99e a konstrukci v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9ho kitu zalo\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xa9ho na pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9ho n\xc3\xa1stroje PICkit 3.\r\nVe druh\xc3\xa9 kapitole se sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xadme s konfigurac\xc3\xad oscil\xc3\xa1toru a s mo\xc5\xbenosti konfigurace oscil\xc3\xa1torov\xc3\xa9ho syst\xc3\xa9mu.\r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad vstupn\xc4\x9b/v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadch port\xc5\xaf. Je zm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bna konfigurace analogov\xc3\xbdch a digit\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf, notifikace zm\xc4\x9bny vstupu, mo\xc5\xbenosti registr\xc5\xaf CLR, SET a INV. D\xc3\xa1le je vysv\xc4\x9btlena funkce jednotky PPS (Peripheral Pin Select), kter\xc3\xa9 dovoluje mapovat sign\xc3\xa1ly periferi\xc3\xad na r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 v\xc3\xbdvody mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru. Na z\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9br jsou uvedeny funkce z knihovny PLIB, kter\xc3\xa9 se pro ovl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf a ostatn\xc3\xadch jednotek pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvaj\xc3\xad.\r\nVe \xc4\x8dtvrt\xc3\xa9 kapitole je p\xc5\x99edveden prvn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad - programov\xc4\x9b \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED. Druh\xc3\xbd program ukazuje konfiguraci portu B pro 16bitov\xc3\xa9 operace na p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu &quot;b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadho sv\xc4\x9btla&quot;.\r\nP\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola je stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbdm popisem jednotky Timer1 (16bitov\xc3\xa9ho \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de). Pro z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99edstavu je p\xc5\x99edveden p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED, kdy je odm\xc4\x9br \xc4\x8dasu \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en pomoc\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de.\r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad pojmy p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1ovac\xc3\xadho syst\xc3\xa9mu. Jako praktick\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad je dopln\xc4\x9bno blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED pomoc\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad jednotky Timer1.\r\nSedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 varianty o\xc5\xa1et\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad digit\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch vstup\xc5\xaf. Na p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu obsluhy rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de je p\xc5\x99edvedeno klasick\xc3\xa9 \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad, vzorkov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad stavu pomoc\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de a pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad funkce notifikace zm\xc4\x9bny vstup\xc5\xaf.\r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje jednotky Timer2/3 a Timer4/5, kter\xc3\xa9 slou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xad jako 16/32bitov\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de. Tyto jednotky se rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvaj\xc3\xad ve spojitosti s jednotkami OC a IC. Jako praktick\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady je dopln\xc4\x9bno m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho sign\xc3\xa1lu v 16bitov\xc3\xa9m a 32bitov\xc3\xa9m re\xc5\xbeimu.\r\nDev\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 jednotky OC (Output Compare), kter\xc3\xa9 slou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xad pro generov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad jednor\xc3\xa1zov\xc3\xbdch impulz\xc5\xaf nebo periodick\xc3\xa9 skupiny impulz\xc5\xaf. Jako p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad je uvedeno generov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad PWM sign\xc3\xa1lu.\r\nDes\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na jednotk\xc3\xa1m IC (Input Capture), kter\xc3\xa9 slou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xad pro m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad periody a \xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99ky impulz\xc5\xaf. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady p\xc5\x99edv\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bj\xc3\xad m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad periody a \xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99ky impulzu vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho sign\xc3\xa1lu.\r\nJeden\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje 10bitov\xc3\xbd A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady uv\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bj\xc3\xad mo\xc5\xbenosti automatick\xc3\xa9ho spou\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad a spou\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99es jednotku Timer3.\r\nDvan\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje jednotku SPI (s\xc3\xa9riovou vysokorychlostn\xc3\xad sm\xc4\x9brnici ur\xc4\x8denou pro p\xc5\x99ipojov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad perifern\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf). P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady uv\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bj\xc3\xad ovl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho 12bitov\xc3\xa9ho D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku typu MCP4921 (ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad funkce a generov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad periodick\xc3\xa9ho sign\xc3\xa1lu). D\xc3\xa1le je pops\xc3\xa1no p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xad klasick\xc3\xa9ho dvou\xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dkov\xc3\xa9ho displeje pomoc\xc3\xad obvodu 74HCT595 a s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xa9 sb\xc4\x9brnice v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b kr\xc3\xa1tk\xc3\xa9ho p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu.\r\n\r\nV p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloze naleznete sch\xc3\xa9ma jednotliv\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravk\xc5\xaf: PIC32MXBOARD (levn\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xbd kit pro PIC32MX130F064B-I/SP), M8LED (osmice LED), MDYNDSP (dynamick\xc3\xbd displej), MROTSW (rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8d), MRX555 (gener\xc3\xa1tor obd\xc3\xa9ln\xc3\xadkov\xc3\xa9ho sign\xc3\xa1lu), MADTEST (regul\xc3\xa1tor nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad pro analogov\xc3\xbd vstup), MSPIDAC (12bitov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk s SPI sb\xc4\x9brnic\xc3\xad), MSPILCD (dvou\xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dkov\xc3\xbd displej s SPI sb\xc4\x9brnic\xc3\xad).\r\n\r\nKniha vych\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad v mal\xc3\xa9m n\xc3\xa1kladu.\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99ehled p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad\xc5\xaf\r\n\r\n\tProgramov\xc3\xa9 blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED\r\n\t16bitov\xc3\xa9 b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad sv\xc4\x9btlo na portu B.\r\n\tBlik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED s odm\xc4\x9brem \xc4\x8dasu pomoc\xc3\xad jednotky Timer1.\r\n\tBlik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED pomoc\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad jednotky Timer1.\r\n\tObsluha rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de v programov\xc3\xa9 smy\xc4\x8dce.\r\n\tObsluha rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de pomoc\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de.\r\n\tObsluha rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de pomoc\xc3\xad notifikace zm\xc4\x9bny vstup\xc5\xaf.\r\n\tM\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu v 16bitov\xc3\xa9m re\xc5\xbeimu \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 jednotkou Timer3.\r\n\tOv\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad funkce jednotky SPI pomoc\xc3\xad D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku MCP4921.\r\n\tGenerov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad harmonick\xc3\xa9ho sign\xc3\xa1lu pomoc\xc3\xad SPI a MCP4921.\r\n\tV\xc3\xbdpis textu na \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dkov\xc3\xa9m LCD, kter\xc3\xbd je p\xc5\x99ipojen p\xc5\x99es SPI.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-478-1', description='Stav zpracov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad titulu\r\n\r\n\tAuto\xc5\x99i na knize vytrvale pracuj\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\tobsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nKniha je ur\xc4\x8dena v\xc5\xa1em z\xc3\xa1jemc\xc5\xafm o problematiku \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9ho zpracov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l\xc5\xaf a je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na praktick\xc3\xbdm aspekt\xc5\xafm realizace \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf a \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc4\x9b pracuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ic\xc3\xadch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstroj\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nPo nezbytn\xc3\xa9m teoretick\xc3\xa9m \xc3\xbavodu, jsou prakticky realizov\xc3\xa1ny filtry typu p\xc3\xa1smov\xc3\xa1 propust za pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad float-point aritmetiky, fractional aritmetiky a pomoc\xc3\xad tabulky p\xc5\x99edem stanoven\xc3\xbdch sou\xc4\x8din\xc5\xaf jednotliv\xc3\xbdch koeficient\xc5\xaf filtru. Tyto realizace jsou ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99eny m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xadm a v\xc3\xbdsledky porovn\xc3\xa1ny.\r\n\r\nDruh\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st knihy je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na realizaci \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc4\x9b pracuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ic\xc3\xadch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstroj\xc5\xaf. Je realizov\xc3\xa1n spektr\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad analyz\xc3\xa1tor, RLCG metr a Watt-metr.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola p\xc5\x99edstavuje \xc3\xbavod do filtrace sign\xc3\xa1l\xc5\xaf. Jsou p\xc5\x99ipomenuty r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 aproximace kmito\xc4\x8dtov\xc3\xbdch charakteristik. D\xc3\xa1le je vysv\xc4\x9btlena realizace filtru \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdm zp\xc5\xafsobem a diskutov\xc3\xa1na citlivost filtra\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad funkce na zm\xc4\x9bnu koeficient\xc5\xaf a polohu p\xc3\xb3l\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nDruh\xc3\xa1 kapitola p\xc5\x99ipom\xc3\xadn\xc3\xa1 metodu impulzn\xc3\xad invariance, tedy realizaci \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9ho filtru tak, aby jeho impulzn\xc3\xad charakteristika odpov\xc3\xaddala analogov\xc3\xa9mu prototypu. Uveden\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad ukazuje prakticky dosa\xc5\xbeiteln\xc3\xa9 v\xc3\xbdsledky v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b diskuze citlivosti na kone\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd po\xc4\x8det platn\xc3\xbdch cifer realizovan\xc3\xbdch koeficient\xc5\xaf. Filtry jsou analyzov\xc3\xa1ny programem MicroCap 10.\r\n\r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola p\xc5\x99edstavuje m\xc3\xa9n\xc4\x9b zn\xc3\xa1mou metodu skokov\xc3\xa9 invariance. \r\n\r\n\xc4\x8ctvrt\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje metodu u\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvaj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad biline\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad transformaci a vych\xc3\xa1zej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad z toleran\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho pole filtru. T\xc3\xadmto zp\xc5\xafsobem jsou v kapitol\xc3\xa1ch 4.2 a 4.3 navr\xc5\xbeeny dv\xc4\x9b p\xc3\xa1smov\xc3\xa9 propusti, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou posl\xc3\xa9ze v kapitol\xc3\xa1ch 5 a 6 prakticky realizov\xc3\xa1ny pomoc\xc3\xad mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf \xc5\x99ad Atmel AVR ATmega a Microchip PIC32MX.\r\n\r\nP\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje realizaci \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf pomoc\xc3\xad mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru ATmega644. Nejd\xc5\x99\xc3\xadve jsou dynamika sestavy p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravk\xc5\xaf EADC (vstupn\xc3\xad modul pro A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk) a MSPIDAC (s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbd 12bitov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk) a j\xc3\xa1dro konstrukce filtru ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99eny na tzv. transparentn\xc3\xadm re\xc5\xbeimu. N\xc3\xa1sleduj\xc3\xad realizace p\xc3\xa1smov\xc3\xbdch propust\xc3\xad navr\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xbdch v kapitol\xc3\xa1ch 4.2 a 4.3. Realizace pomoc\xc3\xad float-point aritmetiky nen\xc3\xad pro zvolen\xc3\xbd vzorkovac\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8det 10 kHz mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa1. Jako alternativy jsou p\xc5\x99edvedeny realizace zalo\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xa9 na pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad fractional aritmetiky a p\xc5\x99edem vypo\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtan\xc3\xa9 tabulky sou\xc4\x8din\xc5\xaf koeficient\xc5\xaf pro 8bitov\xc3\xa9, 10bitov\xc3\xa9 a 12bitov\xc3\xa9 rozli\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad. Na z\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9br jsou porovn\xc3\xa1ny v\xc3\xbdsledky m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad filtr\xc5\xaf s ohledem na \xc4\x8dasovou a pam\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ovou n\xc3\xa1ro\xc4\x8dnost a v\xc3\xbdsledn\xc3\xbd pom\xc4\x9br \xc3\xbatlumu v propustn\xc3\xa9 a nepropustn\xc3\xa9 oblasti.\r\n\r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje realizaci \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf pomoc\xc3\xad mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru PIC32MX. Filtry dle kapitol 4.2 a 4.3 lze nyn\xc3\xad realizovat pomoc\xc3\xad float-point aritmetiky. Realizace pomoc\xc3\xad fractional aritmetiky je rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe p\xc5\x99edvedena. Pro fractional aritmetiku se pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvaj\xc3\xad funkce z knihovny PIC32 DSP. Dosa\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xa9 v\xc3\xbdsledky jsou op\xc4\x9bt ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99eny m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xadm a porovn\xc3\xa1ny.\r\n\r\nSedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad realizaci spektr\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadho analyz\xc3\xa1toru. Realizace je zalo\xc5\xbeena na pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad FFT (rychl\xc3\xa9 Fourierovy transformace). Je pops\xc3\xa1na konstrukce vstupn\xc3\xad analogov\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti (zajist\xc3\xad \xc3\xbapravu amplitudy vstupn\xc3\xadho sign\xc3\xa1lu, zabran\xc3\xad vzniku aliasingu a vlo\xc5\xbe\xc3\xad stejnosm\xc4\x9brnou slo\xc5\xbeku pro n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc3\xbd A/D p\xc5\x99evod). Pro realizaci je pou\xc5\xbeit mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r PIC32MX130F064B-I/SP. Spektr\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad analyz\xc3\xa1tor je 5-p\xc3\xa1smov\xc3\xbd, jednotliv\xc3\xa1 p\xc3\xa1sma jsou 100 Hz, 300 Hz, 1 kHz, 3 kHz a 10 kHz. Zobrazen\xc3\xad amplitudy sign\xc3\xa1lu v jednotliv\xc3\xbdch p\xc3\xa1smech je \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1eno pomoc\xc3\xad maticov\xc3\xa9ho displeje.\r\n\r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad realizaci RLCG m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99i\xc4\x8de. Realizace spo\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1 ve vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad referen\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sinusov\xc3\xa9ho sign\xc3\xa1lu pomoc\xc3\xad D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku. Tento sign\xc3\xa1l proch\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad impedan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadm p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadkem. N\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b je vzorkov\xc3\xa1n A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadkem a pomoc\xc3\xad korelace i a q slo\xc5\xbeek jsou stanoveny re\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xa9 a imagin\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad slo\xc5\xbeky m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xa9 impedance. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se vlastn\xc4\x9b o pln\xc4\x9b \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc4\x9b proveden\xc3\xbd vektor-voltmetr. Pro realizaci je pou\xc5\xbeit mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r PIC32MX130F064B-I/SP. M\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ic\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l m\xc3\xa1 kmito\xc4\x8det 1 kHz, rozli\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99evodu je 12bit\xc5\xaf a na periodu p\xc5\x99ipad\xc3\xa1 360 vzork\xc5\xaf. Nam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xa1 hodnota re\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xa9 a imagin\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti je zobrazena na dvou\xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dkov\xc3\xa9m LCD displeji, kter\xc3\xbd je ovl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1n pomoc\xc3\xad SPI sb\xc4\x9brnice.\r\n\r\nV dev\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa9 kapitole je pops\xc3\xa1na realizace Watt-metru. Pro realizaci je pou\xc5\xbeit mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r PIC32MX130F064B-I/SP. Vzorkovac\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8det je 50 kHz. Mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r prov\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8det \xc4\x8dinn\xc3\xa9ho v\xc3\xbdkonu, st\xc5\x99edn\xc3\xad a efektivn\xc3\xad hodnoty nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a proudu. Rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe jsou stanoveny maxim\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad hodnoty nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a proudu. N\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b je stanovena hodnota zd\xc3\xa1nliv\xc3\xa9ho v\xc3\xbdkonu. Na LDC displeji je mo\xc5\xbeno zobrazit: \xc4\x8dinn\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdkon a \xc3\xba\xc4\x8din\xc3\xadk, maxim\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad hodnoty nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a proudu, efektivn\xc3\xad hodnoty nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a proudu, st\xc5\x99edn\xc3\xad hodnoty nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a proudu. T\xc3\xadm tento p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstroj nahrazuje nejen klasick\xc3\xbd W-metr ale tak\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99edstavuje levnou realizaci obvodu pro stanoven\xc3\xad skute\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9 efektivn\xc3\xad hodnoty (True RMS) nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad nebo proudu.\r\n\r\nV p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloze nalezneme podklady pro v\xc3\xbdrobu jednotliv\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravk\xc5\xaf: COM644KIT (levn\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xbd kit pro ATmega644), EADC (vstupn\xc3\xad modul pro A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk), MSPIDAC (s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbd 12bitov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk), PIC32MXBOARD (levn\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xbd kit pro PIC32MX130F064B-I/SP), SPEC_ANAL (spektr\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad analyz\xc3\xa1tor), RLCG METER (m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99i\xc4\x8d RLCG), W-metr (m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99i\xc4\x8d v\xc3\xbdkonu, maxim\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad a efektivn\xc3\xad hodnoty), MLCDW (2\xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dkov\xc3\xbd LCD displej).\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-497-2', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nC\xc3\xadlem knihy je nav\xc3\xa1zat na \xc3\xbasp\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xa9 publikace z oblasti um\xc4\x9bl\xc3\xa9 inteligence nakladatelstv\xc3\xad BEN \xe2\x80\x93 technick\xc3\xa1 literatura. A pr\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9b v r\xc3\xa1mci t\xc3\xa9to publikace jsou prezentov\xc3\xa1ny vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xa9 metodiky pro anal\xc3\xbdzu a rozpozn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad struktur v \xc4\x8dasov\xc4\x9b z\xc3\xa1visl\xc3\xbdch datech. Konkr\xc3\xa9tn\xc4\x9b je \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 sezn\xc3\xa1men s vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xbdmi detek\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad syst\xc3\xa9my umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadmi rozpozn\xc3\xa1vat struktury vzor\xc5\xaf, je\xc5\xbe reprezentuj\xc3\xad chov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad komplexn\xc3\xadch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf, jako jsou nap\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad struktury Elliottov\xc3\xbdch vln a jejich deformac\xc3\xad. V\xc5\xa1echny zde prezentovan\xc3\xa9 klasifik\xc3\xa1tory jsou zalo\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xa9 na um\xc4\x9bl\xc3\xbdch neuronov\xc3\xbdch s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xadch a jejich funk\xc4\x8dnost byla ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ena v experiment\xc3\xa1lnch simulac\xc3\xadch. Velk\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st knihy se proto v\xc4\x9bnuje samotn\xc3\xbdm vzor\xc5\xafm, jejich popisu, reprezentaci a p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadprav\xc4\x9b tr\xc3\xa9novac\xc3\xadch mno\xc5\xbein pro adaptaci vybran\xc3\xbdch neuronov\xc3\xbdch s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad. \xc4\x8casov\xc4\x9b z\xc3\xa1visl\xc3\xa1 data reprezentuj\xc3\xad chov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf, na kter\xc3\xa9 nahl\xc3\xad\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadme \xe2\x80\x9azdola-nahoru\xe2\x80\x98, a proto zde uplat\xc5\x88ujeme p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstup bottom-up se znaky samoorganizace a emergence. Nejprve v\xc5\xbedy vymez\xc3\xadme jednotliv\xc3\xa9 entity syst\xc3\xa9mu a vzory jejich chov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad, p\xc5\x99i\xc4\x8dem\xc5\xbe interakce mezi entitami v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b chov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad syst\xc3\xa9mu jako celku pot\xc3\xa9 vyplynou b\xc4\x9bhem \xc4\x8dinnosti syst\xc3\xa9mu \xe2\x80\x93 emerguj\xc3\xad za jeho b\xc4\x9bhu. \xc4\x8cten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 je v r\xc3\xa1mci t\xc3\xa9to publikace sezn\xc3\xa1men s r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xbdmi klasifik\xc3\xa1tory na b\xc3\xa1zi um\xc4\x9bl\xc3\xbdch neuronov\xc3\xbdch s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad jako n\xc3\xa1stroje pro klasifikaci a rozpozn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad vzor\xc5\xaf v grafech, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou pou\xc5\xbeiteln\xc3\xa9 v b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9m (komer\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadm) prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad burzy \xc4\x8di p\xc5\x99i simulac\xc3\xadch. \r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-476-7', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nO knize\r\n\r\nTato nov\xc3\xa1 rozs\xc3\xa1hlej\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad publikace vych\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad z knihy \r\n&quot;Vliv polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf na nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavu&quot;\r\nvydanou ji\xc5\xbe v roce 2002 (nyn\xc3\xad dostupn\xc3\xa1 pouze v elektronick\xc3\xa9 podob\xc4\x9b jako PDF).\r\nV uveden\xc3\xa9 knize byla pozornost v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na zejm\xc3\xa9na klasick\xc3\xbdm polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdm m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm a jejich vlivu na nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavu. Jsou zde prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1ny i vlivy nep\xc5\x99\xc3\xadm\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf kmito\xc4\x8dtu. Av\xc5\xa1ak mal\xc3\xa1 pozornost je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm mal\xc3\xbdch v\xc3\xbdkon\xc5\xaf, sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdm nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xadm zdroj\xc5\xafm - tedy za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xadm, kter\xc3\xa9 se v sou\xc4\x8dasnosti vyskytuj\xc3\xad nejv\xc3\xadce. Z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad tez\xc3\xad knihy bylo vy\xc5\xa1et\xc5\x99ov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad vlivu polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf na nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavu.\r\n\r\nZa deset rok\xc5\xaf od vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad zm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xa9 knihy vzniklo velk\xc3\xa9 mno\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xad nov\xc3\xbdch typ\xc5\xaf m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf, jejich struktur, zm\xc4\x9bnily se zp\xc5\xafsoby \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad. Obrovsky narostl pod\xc3\xadl spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf s mal\xc3\xbdmi v\xc3\xbdkony, jako jsou nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad zdroje pro v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8detn\xc3\xad techniku, dom\xc3\xa1c\xc3\xad elektroniku a sv\xc4\x9bteln\xc3\xa9 zdroje. Po\xc5\xbeadavkem jsou nyn\xc3\xad konstrukce spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf s minimalizovan\xc3\xbdmi vlivy na nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavu, u velk\xc3\xbdch v\xc3\xbdkon\xc5\xaf pak komplexn\xc3\xad dod\xc3\xa1vky v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b realizace opat\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad proti negativn\xc3\xadm \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dink\xc5\xafm provozu polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad na s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5. Proto jsou v knize kapitoly v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny i t\xc3\xa9to problematice. Jsou uvedeny vlastnosti a v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dty impedance s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b s ohledem na harmonick\xc3\xa9. Na z\xc3\xa1klad\xc4\x9b v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dtu zkreslen\xc3\xad je navr\xc5\xbeena filtra\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b kompenza\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad stanice. P\xc5\x99i n\xc3\xa1vrhu za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad nebo p\xc5\x99i jeho p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xad do soustavy mus\xc3\xad b\xc3\xbdt akceptov\xc3\xa1ny po\xc5\xbeadavky z elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9 kompatibility jak v oblasti n\xc3\xadzkofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad, tak i vysokofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch projev\xc5\xaf. Nov\xc3\xbdm jevem je provoz m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf s nejvy\xc5\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad odolnost\xc3\xad proti pokles\xc5\xafm nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad v nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustav\xc4\x9b. \r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99edkl\xc3\xa1dan\xc3\xa1 kniha si klade za c\xc3\xadl sezn\xc3\xa1mit u\xc5\xbeivatele s uvedenou problematikou. Je ur\xc4\x8dena \xc5\xa1irok\xc3\xa9mu okruhu \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf. Auto\xc5\x99i doufaj\xc3\xad, \xc5\xbee odpov\xc4\x9bdi zde najdou jak pracovn\xc3\xadci ze z\xc3\xa1vod\xc5\xaf, kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad mus\xc3\xad problematiku EMC \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1it jako jeden z mnoha probl\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf, tak specialist\xc3\xa9 na problematiku EMC polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. \r\n\r\nNa knize spolupracoval kolektiv pracovn\xc3\xadk\xc5\xaf Z\xc3\xa1pado\xc4\x8desk\xc3\xa9 univerzity v Plzni n\xc4\x9bkolik rok\xc5\xaf. V knize jsou koncentrov\xc3\xa1ny mnohalet\xc3\xa9 zku\xc5\xa1enosti pr\xc3\xa1ce ve v\xc3\xbdzkumu, v\xc3\xbdvoji a spolupr\xc3\xa1ci s prax\xc3\xad. Sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc4\x9b jsou uvedeny nejnov\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad poznatky z oboru tak dynamicky se rozv\xc3\xadjej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadho, jak\xc3\xbdm elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9 kompatibilita polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf beze sporu je. \r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nO problematice\r\n\r\nN\xc3\xa1roky na elektrickou energii neust\xc3\xa1le rostou. Roste a vyv\xc3\xadj\xc3\xad se zejm\xc3\xa9na po\xc4\x8det spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 odeb\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad nesinusov\xc3\xbd proud. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se nejen o velk\xc3\xa1 a klasick\xc3\xa1 za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad (obloukov\xc3\xa9 pece, velk\xc3\xa9 pohony), ale t\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe o za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad velmi mal\xc3\xbdch v\xc3\xbdkon\xc5\xaf. Vlivem masivn\xc3\xadho n\xc3\xa1r\xc5\xafstu pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xbdch elektronick\xc3\xbdch za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xbd je umo\xc5\xben\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbd na jedn\xc3\xa9 stran\xc4\x9b kvalitn\xc3\xad sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stkovou z\xc3\xa1kladnou a na stran\xc4\x9b druh\xc3\xa9 jejich cenou, roste i pod\xc3\xadl spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf se zkreslen\xc3\xbdm odb\xc4\x9brem proudu. P\xc5\x99esto\xc5\xbee normy u mal\xc3\xbdch spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf p\xc5\x99edepisuj\xc3\xad ur\xc4\x8dit\xc3\xa9 meze nelinearity, jsou celkov\xc3\xa9 hodnoty odeb\xc3\xadran\xc3\xbdch neline\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch proud\xc5\xaf velik\xc3\xa9. To vede ke zkreslen\xc3\xad nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad, vzniku deforma\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch v\xc3\xbdkon\xc5\xaf, p\xc5\x99et\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbeov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad veden\xc3\xad a dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm nep\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzniv\xc3\xbdm d\xc5\xafsledk\xc5\xafm. \r\n\r\nV pr\xc5\xafmyslov\xc3\xbdch podnic\xc3\xadch pak se neust\xc3\xa1le zvy\xc5\xa1uj\xc3\xad po\xc4\x8dty pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xbdch polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. I kdy\xc5\xbe jsou \xc4\x8dasto v\xc3\xbdkony jednotliv\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf mal\xc3\xa9, je jejich mno\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xad a v\xc3\xbdkon takov\xc3\xa9, \xc5\xbee v z\xc3\xa1vodov\xc3\xbdch s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xadch jejich provozem doch\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad k nep\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzniv\xc3\xbdm jev\xc5\xafm. Sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc3\xa9 spolup\xc5\xafsoben\xc3\xad v r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xbdch \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stech rozvod\xc5\xaf pak vede nejen k deformaci nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad k\xc5\x99ivky, ale i ke vzniku rezonan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch jev\xc5\xaf. Naopak, vlivem poruch v nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustav\xc4\x9b pak mohou m\xc3\xadt citliv\xc3\xa1 elektronick\xc3\xa1 za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad probl\xc3\xa9my nebo dokonce m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee b\xc3\xbdt jejich \xc4\x8dinnost zastavena, i kdy\xc5\xbe nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustava n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b pracuje norm\xc3\xa1ln\xc4\x9b. Nov\xc4\x9b vyv\xc3\xadjen\xc3\xa9 typy m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf jsou neust\xc3\xa1le sofistikovan\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad. Jejich konstrukce a programov\xc3\xa9 vybaven\xc3\xad nen\xc3\xad provedeno pouze s ohledem na spln\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad po\xc5\xbeadavk\xc5\xaf spot\xc5\x99ebitele (pohonu), ale sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc4\x9b je br\xc3\xa1n z\xc5\x99etel i na interakci s nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavou. Za posledn\xc3\xadch 20 let do\xc5\xa1lo k doslova raketov\xc3\xa9mu n\xc3\xa1r\xc5\xafstu m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Vlivem nov\xc3\xbdch polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch prvk\xc5\xaf a s rozvojem \xc5\x99\xc3\xadd\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad elektroniky jsou spl\xc5\x88ov\xc3\xa1ny i takov\xc3\xa9 po\xc5\xbeadavky, kter\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99ed n\xc4\x9bkolika lety byly nemo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9. Vznikaj\xc3\xad rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe nov\xc3\xa9 struktury m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. To v\xc5\xa1ak op\xc4\x9bt vede ke vzniku po\xc5\xbeadavk\xc5\xaf na \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad problematiky negativn\xc3\xadch vliv\xc5\xaf m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf na s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5 a k n\xc3\xa1vrhu opravn\xc3\xbdch prost\xc5\x99edk\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nZ obsahu knihy\r\n\r\nZ\xc3\xa1kladem knihy jsou n\xc3\xadzkofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad projevy interakc\xc3\xad mezi m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8dem a\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavou. Pouze v\xc2\xa0n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xbdch z\xc5\x99etelech je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na pozornost i\xc2\xa0vysokofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad problematice, a\xc2\xa0to zejm\xc3\xa9na ve\xc2\xa0spojen\xc3\xad s\xc2\xa0n\xc3\xa1vrhy m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0pr\xc5\xafmyslov\xc3\xbdch z\xc3\xa1vodech je obvykle velmi hust\xc3\xa1, zasmy\xc4\x8dkovan\xc3\xa1 elektrick\xc3\xa1 rozvodn\xc3\xa1 soustava (\xc4\x8dasto o\xc2\xa0mnoha nap\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbarovn\xc3\xadch) a\xc2\xa0dnes p\xc5\x99istupuj\xc3\xad mnoh\xc3\xa9 \xc5\x99\xc3\xadd\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad, ovl\xc3\xa1dac\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0datov\xc3\xa9 veden\xc3\xad. To vede k\xc2\xa0tomu, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0doch\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad k\xc2\xa0projev\xc5\xafm vz\xc3\xa1jemn\xc3\xa9ho ovliv\xc5\x88ov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf st\xc3\xa1le \xc4\x8dast\xc4\x9bji.\r\nJak\xc3\xbdm zp\xc5\xafsobem tyto probl\xc3\xa9my \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1it? V\xc2\xa0prvn\xc3\xadm p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpad\xc4\x9b je t\xc5\x99eba se\xc2\xa0sna\xc5\xbeit vyr\xc3\xa1b\xc4\x9bt takov\xc3\xa9 elektrotechnick\xc3\xa9 v\xc3\xbdrobky, kter\xc3\xa9 ovliv\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xad elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9 okol\xc3\xad co nejm\xc3\xa9n\xc4\x9b a\xc2\xa0sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc4\x9b tak, aby\xc2\xa0byly co nejv\xc3\xadce odoln\xc3\xa9 proti t\xc4\x9bmto jev\xc5\xafm. Ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdrobek je tedy ur\xc4\x8dit\xc3\xbdm zp\xc5\xafsobem v\xc5\xbedy zdrojem ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0je sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc4\x9b ru\xc5\xa1en. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpustn\xc3\xa9 hodnoty pro\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8dinnost elektrick\xc3\xbdch za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad v\xc2\xa0elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9m prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad jsou dnes obvykle d\xc3\xa1ny p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadslu\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdmi normami.\r\n \r\nV\xc3\xbdrobci t\xc4\x9bchto za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad i\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xbdzkumn\xc3\xa9 \xc3\xbastavy v\xc4\x9bnuj\xc3\xad t\xc3\xa9to ot\xc3\xa1zce velkou pozornost. P\xc5\x99esto ale\xc2\xa0doch\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad k\xc2\xa0tomu, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0vlivy za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5 \xc4\x8di na\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jen\xc3\xa9 za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad jsou takov\xc3\xa9ho charakteru, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0bu\xc4\x8f nem\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee pracovat samotn\xc3\xbd spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d, nebo (v\xc2\xa0hor\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpad\xc4\x9b) je ovlivn\xc4\x9bna s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5 takov\xc3\xbdm zp\xc5\xafsobem, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0nemohou pracovat ani\xc2\xa0dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xa1 za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad. Pak je nutn\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99ijmout dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad opat\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xa1 tyto \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dinky odstran\xc3\xad, nebo alespo\xc5\x88 minimalizuj\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99ijatelnou \xc3\xbarove\xc5\x88.\r\n\r\nProblematice n\xc3\xadzkofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad dominuj\xc3\xad zhruba \xc4\x8dty\xc5\x99i z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad okruhy:\r\n\r\n\tharmonick\xc3\xa9 proudy (vy\xc5\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1d\xc5\xaf), produkovan\xc3\xa9 neline\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadmi spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8di,\r\n\timpedance s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b,\r\n\tzm\xc4\x9bny nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad v\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xadti,\r\n\tza\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad pro\xc2\xa0minimalizaci harmonick\xc3\xbdch proud\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0kompenzaci \xc3\xba\xc4\x8din\xc3\xadku.\r\n\r\nT\xc4\x9bmto bod\xc5\xafm jsou proto v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny hlavn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti knihy.\r\n\r\nNejprve je uveden stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd matematick\xc3\xbd apar\xc3\xa1t, kter\xc3\xbd je p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dtech pot\xc5\x99ebn\xc3\xbd, zejm\xc3\xa9na s\xc2\xa0ohledem na\xc2\xa0Fourierovu anal\xc3\xbdzu. Sou\xc4\x8dasn\xc4\x9b jsou zavedeny z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad matematick\xc3\xa9 vztahy pro\xc2\xa0neharmonick\xc3\xa9 veli\xc4\x8diny. Na\xc2\xa0rozd\xc3\xadl od\xc2\xa0mnoh\xc3\xbdch publikac\xc3\xad o\xc2\xa0neharmonick\xc3\xbdch veli\xc4\x8din\xc3\xa1ch je zde i\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad uva\xc5\xbeov\xc3\xa1no obecn\xc4\x9b jako nesinusov\xc3\xa9, s\xc2\xa0ur\xc4\x8dit\xc3\xbdm zkreslen\xc3\xadm. To je v\xc2\xa0sou\xc4\x8dasnosti ji\xc5\xbe nezbytn\xc3\xa9. D\xc5\xafraz je t\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe kladen na\xc2\xa0definov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad jednotliv\xc3\xbdch v\xc3\xbdkon\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8dinitel\xc5\xaf zkreslen\xc3\xad. V\xc5\xa1echny uveden\xc3\xa9 definice jsou v\xc2\xa0souladu s\xc2\xa0platn\xc3\xbdmi normami.\r\n\r\nDal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad kapitola se\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bnuje kvalit\xc4\x9b elektrick\xc3\xa9 energie, poruch\xc3\xa1m v\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustav\xc4\x9b, zdroj\xc5\xafm harmonick\xc3\xbdch, poruch\xc3\xa1m vznikaj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch v\xc2\xa0rozvodn\xc3\xa9 soustav\xc4\x9b a\xc2\xa0mo\xc5\xbenostem \xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad. St\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbeejn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st t\xc3\xa9to kapitoly je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na teoretick\xc3\xbdm aspekt\xc5\xafm \xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadslu\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdm frekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadm rozsah\xc5\xafm a\xc2\xa0za\xc4\x8dlen\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xadm r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xbdch druh\xc5\xaf ru\xc5\xa1iv\xc3\xbdch sign\xc3\xa1l\xc5\xaf. Kapitola je naps\xc3\xa1na s\xc2\xa0c\xc3\xadlem upozornit na\xc2\xa0projevy zejm\xc3\xa9na vysokofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad u\xc2\xa0polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\nVelk\xc3\xa1 pozornost je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na impedanc\xc3\xadm s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b. Zde jsou probr\xc3\xa1ny nejen zp\xc5\xafsoby jak\xc2\xa0modelovat jednotliv\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti rozvod\xc5\xaf, ale\xc2\xa0zejm\xc3\xa9na jak\xc2\xa0modelovat rozs\xc3\xa1hl\xc3\xa9 zasmy\xc4\x8dkovan\xc3\xa9 z\xc3\xa1vodov\xc3\xa9 s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b. Sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad kapitoly je popis typick\xc3\xbdch impedanc\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0vznik harmonick\xc3\xbdch nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad vy\xc5\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1d\xc5\xaf. Na\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladech jsou uk\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1ny mo\xc5\xbenosti v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dt\xc5\xaf impedance s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b a\xc2\xa0zejm\xc3\xa9na pak harmonick\xc3\xbdch nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad vy\xc5\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1d\xc5\xaf. \xc4\x8cten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99i jsou upozorn\xc4\x9bni na\xc2\xa0mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 rezonance, kter\xc3\xa9 v\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xadti vznikaj\xc3\xad, na\xc2\xa0jejich v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dty a\xc2\xa0d\xc5\xafsledky. Jedna podkapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na zvl\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1tnostem v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dtu impedance v\xc2\xa0trak\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch soustav\xc3\xa1ch.\r\n\r\nCo do\xc2\xa0velikosti je nejrozs\xc3\xa1hlej\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad p\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola. Ta je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na ur\xc4\x8den\xc3\xad frekvence a\xc2\xa0velikosti harmonick\xc3\xbdch proud\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8di odeb\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1ny ze\xc2\xa0st\xc5\x99\xc3\xaddav\xc3\xa9 nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b. Nejprve je uvedeno odvozen\xc3\xad zn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xa9ho amplitudov\xc3\xa9ho z\xc3\xa1kona. Ten je pak d\xc3\xa1le roz\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99en na\xc2\xa0tzv. zobecn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbd amplitudov\xc3\xbd z\xc3\xa1kon, platn\xc3\xbd pro\xc2\xa0odeb\xc3\xadran\xc3\xa9 proudy v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1iny m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Spole\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b s\xc2\xa0principem superpozice pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bh\xc5\xaf pak m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee b\xc3\xbdt provedena harmonick\xc3\xa1 anal\xc3\xbdza u\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1iny pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bh\xc5\xaf proud\xc5\xaf. N\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b jsou pak prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1ny vlivy jednotliv\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf na\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5. Postupn\xc4\x9b jsou probr\xc3\xa1ny zp\xc5\xafsoby v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dtu harmonick\xc3\xbdch proud\xc5\xaf klasick\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf (usm\xc4\x9br\xc5\x88ova\xc4\x8de), m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad, cyklokonvertor\xc5\xaf aj. Nejv\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad pozornost kapitoly je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na nep\xc5\x99\xc3\xadm\xc3\xbdm m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm kmito\xc4\x8dtu s\xc2\xa0nap\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xbdm st\xc5\x99\xc3\xadda\xc4\x8dem a\xc2\xa0mo\xc5\xbenostem sn\xc3\xad\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xad proud\xc5\xaf u\xc2\xa0t\xc4\x9bchto m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Z\xc2\xa0nejmodern\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na pozornost pulzn\xc3\xadm usm\xc4\x9br\xc5\x88ova\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm nap\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xa9ho typu. U\xc2\xa0v\xc5\xa1ech m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf jsou uvedeny zp\xc5\xafsoby zji\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad necharakteristick\xc3\xbdch harmonick\xc3\xbdch a\xc2\xa0meziharmonick\xc3\xbdch. P\xc5\x99esto\xc5\xbee je jejich velikost ve\xc2\xa0srovn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad s\xc2\xa0charakteristick\xc3\xbdmi harmonick\xc3\xbdmi obvykle zanedbateln\xc3\xa1, mohou v\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpad\xc4\x9b rezonan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch jev\xc5\xaf vytv\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99et nep\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpustn\xc3\xa1 nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad vy\xc5\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch frekvenc\xc3\xad. Proto\xc5\xbee v\xc2\xa0praxi samostatn\xc4\x9b pracuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d najdeme ji\xc5\xbe ojedin\xc4\x9ble, je nutn\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8dasto \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1it, jak\xc2\xa0postupovat p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0ur\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad negativn\xc3\xadch \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dink\xc5\xaf v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho po\xc4\x8dtu m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou p\xc5\x99ipojov\xc3\xa1ny do\xc2\xa0jednoho p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpojn\xc3\xa9ho bodu v\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad s\xc3\xadti nebo v\xc2\xa0r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xbdch bodech jednoho z\xc3\xa1vodu.\r\n\r\nObs\xc3\xa1hl\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st knihy pat\xc5\x99\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1vrhu opravn\xc3\xbdch prost\xc5\x99edk\xc5\xaf. Tomu se\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bnuje kapitola 6. Proto\xc5\xbee obvykle nejde odd\xc4\x9blit filtra\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0kompenza\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dinek, je kapitola v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na nejen n\xc3\xa1vrhu filtr\xc5\xaf pro\xc2\xa0minimalizaci harmonick\xc3\xbdch, ale\xc2\xa0t\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe i\xc2\xa0problematice kompenzace \xc3\xba\xc4\x8din\xc3\xadku. Je uveden rozs\xc3\xa1hl\xc3\xbd matematick\xc3\xbd apar\xc3\xa1t, kter\xc3\xbd umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uje prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bt n\xc3\xa1vrh filtr\xc5\xaf s\xc2\xa0ohledem na\xc2\xa0pot\xc5\x99eby filtrace i\xc2\xa0kompenzace \xc3\xba\xc4\x8din\xc3\xadku. Nezbytn\xc3\xa9 jsou i\xc2\xa0zp\xc5\xafsoby lad\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad filtr\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0jejich dimenzov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad s\xc2\xa0ohledem na\xc2\xa0harmonick\xc3\xa9 jin\xc3\xbdch frekvenc\xc3\xad, ne\xc5\xbe\xc2\xa0je rezonan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad frekvence filtru. Pozornost je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na i\xc2\xa0slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm typ\xc5\xafm filtr\xc5\xaf. Nezbytnost\xc3\xad jsou v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dty \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dinnosti filtr\xc5\xaf v\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xbdch \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stech soustavy. Sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad jsou t\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe modern\xc3\xad aktivn\xc3\xad filtry a\xc2\xa0za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad pro\xc2\xa0dynamickou kompenzaci \xc3\xba\xc4\x8din\xc3\xadku. \r\n\r\nJedna pas\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbe knihy je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na i\xc2\xa0opa\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbdm \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dink\xc5\xafm \xe2\x80\x93 vliv\xc5\xafm poruch v\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xadti na\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8dinnost m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0mo\xc5\xbenostem, jak\xc2\xa0t\xc4\x9bmto projev\xc5\xafm zabr\xc3\xa1nit. Tato kapitola byla naps\xc3\xa1na na\xc2\xa0z\xc3\xa1klad\xc4\x9b mnoh\xc3\xbdch dotaz\xc5\xaf provozovatel\xc5\xaf m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf v\xc2\xa0pr\xc5\xafmyslov\xc3\xbdch podnic\xc3\xadch. Zejm\xc3\xa9na p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0kr\xc3\xa1tkodob\xc3\xbdch poklesech nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad doch\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasto k\xc2\xa0zastaven\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dinnosti m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8de. P\xc5\x99esto\xc5\xbee se\xc2\xa0nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad velmi brzy vr\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0svoji nomin\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad hodnotu, m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d je zastaven. Do\xc2\xa0obnoven\xc3\xad jeho \xc4\x8dinnosti na\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xbdrobn\xc3\xad parametry p\xc5\x99ed poruchou m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee doj\xc3\xadt k\xc2\xa0velk\xc3\xa9 ekonomick\xc3\xa9 ztr\xc3\xa1t\xc4\x9b.\r\nNezbytnou kapitolou v\xc2\xa0t\xc3\xa9to knize je popis doprovodn\xc3\xbdch jev\xc5\xaf v\xc2\xa0EMC v\xc3\xbdkonov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se\xc2\xa0o\xc2\xa0vysokofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad. Jsou zde uvedeny z\xc3\xa1sady n\xc3\xa1vrhu v\xc3\xbdkonov\xc3\xbdch a\xc2\xa0\xc5\x99\xc3\xadd\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf z\xc2\xa0hlediska EMC. Sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad jsou t\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 odru\xc5\xa1ovac\xc3\xad prost\xc5\x99edky. Odkazy jsou prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bny zejm\xc3\xa9na na\xc2\xa0pas\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbee v\xc2\xa0kapitole 3.\r\n\r\nSou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad problematiky vliv\xc5\xaf m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf na\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xad soustavu jsou v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dty harmonick\xc3\xbdch proud\xc5\xaf klasick\xc3\xbdch s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xbdch zdroj\xc5\xaf mal\xc3\xa9ho v\xc3\xbdkonu a\xc2\xa0impulzn\xc3\xadch nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xadch zdroj\xc5\xaf. V\xc2\xa0kapitole 9 pak jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad konfigurace v\xc3\xbdkonov\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf impulzn\xc3\xadch zdroj\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0jejich harmonick\xc3\xa9 proudy, kter\xc3\xa9 odeb\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad ze\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b. Popis je d\xc4\x9bl\xc3\xa1n s\xc2\xa0ohledem na\xc2\xa0normy, kter\xc3\xa9 harmonick\xc3\xa9 proudy uveden\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf omezuj\xc3\xad. Srovn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad je provedeno s\xc2\xa0klasick\xc3\xbdmi s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xbdmi zdroji.\r\n\r\nPokud existuj\xc3\xad normy, kter\xc3\xa9 se\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bnuj\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadmo p\xc5\xafsoben\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xad\xc5\xa5 u\xc2\xa0jednotliv\xc3\xbdch druh\xc5\xaf m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm, je to probr\xc3\xa1no p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadmo v\xc2\xa0kapitol\xc3\xa1ch jednotliv\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Krom\xc4\x9b toho je normalizaci (zejm\xc3\xa9na pro\xc2\xa0energetick\xc3\xa9 ru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad) v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na samostatn\xc3\xa1 kapitola. Vzhledem k\xc2\xa0velmi \xc4\x8dast\xc3\xbdm zm\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xa1m ve\xc2\xa0zn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad norem bude tato pas\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbe asi nejrychleji \xe2\x80\x9est\xc3\xa1rnout\xe2\x80\x9c, proto je uvedena zejm\xc3\xa9na z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad struktura a\xc2\xa0orientace v\xc2\xa0norm\xc3\xa1ch. Samoz\xc5\x99ejmost\xc3\xad je, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0jsou uv\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bny pouze normy EN \xc4\x8di IEC.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0mnoh\xc3\xbdch kapitol\xc3\xa1ch je uveden nejenom postup pro\xc2\xa0exaktn\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dty harmonick\xc3\xbdch proud\xc5\xaf, ale\xc2\xa0t\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe zjednodu\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xa9 n\xc3\xa1vody na\xc2\xa0ur\xc4\x8den\xc3\xad harmonick\xc3\xbdch proud\xc5\xaf s\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99esnost\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xa1 je v\xc2\xa0praxi dosta\xc4\x8duj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad. V\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1ina kapitol je dopln\xc4\x9bna uk\xc3\xa1zkami \xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xbdch pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bh\xc5\xaf proud\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xbdsledky jejich n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc3\xa9 harmonick\xc3\xa9 anal\xc3\xbdzy. M\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad byla prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bna jak\xc2\xa0v\xc2\xa0laboratorn\xc3\xadch podm\xc3\xadnk\xc3\xa1ch, tak v\xc2\xa0praxi.\r\n\r\nKapitola 11, v\xc4\x9bnovan\xc3\xa1 m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad harmonick\xc3\xbdch by vzhledem ke\xc2\xa0sv\xc3\xa9 d\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeitosti a\xc2\xa0obs\xc3\xa1hlosti jist\xc4\x9b zaslou\xc5\xbeila v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad prostor, p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpadn\xc4\x9b samostatnou knihu. Krom\xc4\x9b nezbytn\xc3\xbdch teoretick\xc3\xbdch \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad, zab\xc3\xbdvaj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch se\xc2\xa0z\xc3\xa1konitostmi p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad harmonick\xc3\xbdch jsou uvedeny normativn\xc3\xad po\xc5\xbeadavky pro\xc2\xa0m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0anal\xc3\xbdzu. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady zde uveden\xc3\xa9 dopl\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xad pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bhy z\xc2\xa0d\xc3\xadl\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadch kapitol. Jejich c\xc3\xadlem je nyn\xc3\xad demonstrace m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xa9 metody, p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpadn\xc4\x9b uk\xc3\xa1zka netypick\xc3\xbdch pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bh\xc5\xaf z\xc2\xa0praxe.\r\n\r\nProblematika, zpracov\xc3\xa1van\xc3\xa1 v\xc2\xa0knize je velmi \xc5\xa1irok\xc3\xa1. Jsou popisov\xc3\xa1ny negativn\xc3\xad \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dinky mnoha za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad, zejm\xc3\xa9na v\xc3\xbdkonov\xc3\xbdch polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Proto jsou prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bny \xc4\x8dast\xc3\xa9 odkazy na\xc2\xa0literaturu, kter\xc3\xa1 je mnohdy pro\xc2\xa0pochopen\xc3\xad princip\xc5\xaf \xc4\x8dinnosti za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0vzniku harmonick\xc3\xbdch nepostradateln\xc3\xa1. S\xc2\xa0ohledem na\xc2\xa0rozsah citovan\xc3\xa9 literatury byl zvolen princip, kdy je bezprost\xc5\x99edn\xc4\x9b souvisej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad literatura uvedena p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadmo na\xc2\xa0konci ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa9 kapitoly. V\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1ina odkaz\xc5\xaf v\xc2\xa0kapitole je a\xc5\xbe\xc2\xa0na\xc2\xa0v\xc3\xbdjimky pr\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9b v\xc2\xa0uveden\xc3\xa9m seznamu. V\xc3\xbdjimkou ze\xc2\xa0seznamu literatury je kapitola 10, kter\xc3\xa1 se\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bnuje norm\xc3\xa1m. Zde jsou n\xc3\xa1zvy norem uvedeny b\xc4\x9bhem jejich popisu a\xc2\xa0nejsou tedy znovu v\xc2\xa0seznamu literatury uvedeny.\r\n\r\nObt\xc3\xad\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 bylo uveden\xc3\xad seznamu zna\xc4\x8dek. Zpracov\xc3\xa1van\xc3\xa1 problematika je tak rozs\xc3\xa1hl\xc3\xa1, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0nen\xc3\xad mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 absolutn\xc4\x9b v\xc5\xa1echny zna\xc4\x8dky v\xc2\xa0seznamu uv\xc3\xa9st. Jsou tedy uvedeny zna\xc4\x8dky z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0zejm\xc3\xa9na ty, kde nen\xc3\xad v\xc5\xbedy jednozna\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b z\xc5\x99ejm\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdznam. Naopak, vzhledem k\xc2\xa0rozs\xc3\xa1hlosti knihy, maj\xc3\xad mnoh\xc3\xa9 zna\xc4\x8dky r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 v\xc3\xbdznamy \xe2\x80\x93 ty jsou v\xc2\xa0seznamu uvedeny, v\xc3\xbdznam je patrn\xc3\xbd z\xc2\xa0textu.\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99es rozs\xc3\xa1hlost uveden\xc3\xa9ho materi\xc3\xa1lu si auto\xc5\x99i uv\xc4\x9bdomuj\xc3\xad, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0nemohli zdaleka uv\xc3\xa9st v\xc5\xa1echny aspekty elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9 kompatibility v\xc3\xbdkonov\xc3\xbdch polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf. Pozornost by zaslou\xc5\xbeily vlivy m\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf na\xc2\xa0nap\xc3\xa1jen\xc3\xa1 za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad, flicker a\xc2\xa0dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad jevy, zejm\xc3\xa9na ve\xc2\xa0vysokofrekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad oblasti. Tato t\xc3\xa9mata ji\xc5\xbe p\xc5\x99ekra\xc4\x8duj\xc3\xad vyt\xc3\xbd\xc4\x8den\xc3\xbd r\xc3\xa1mec knihy. P\xc5\x99esto auto\xc5\x99i doufaj\xc3\xad, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xafm kniha p\xc5\x99inese kvalitn\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad orientaci v\xc2\xa0problematice.\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - D\xc5\xafraz je kladen na typ ATmega644. V textu jsou interpretov\xc3\xa1ny a formou p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad\xc5\xaf p\xc5\x99edvedeny nejpodstatn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad periferie. Knihu pak lze pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadt pro sezn\xc3\xa1men\xc3\xad s mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry ATmega a budov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch aplikac\xc3\xad. Krom\xc4\x9b vlastn\xc3\xadho popisu mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru ATmega644 a jeho periferi\xc3\xad jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny a prakticky p\xc5\x99edvedeny postupy pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99i realizaci b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xben\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbaloh z oblasti mikroprocesorov\xc3\xa9 techniky s\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99ihl\xc3\xa9dnut\xc3\xadm k ot\xc3\xa1zce m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad elektrick\xc3\xbdch i neelektrick\xc3\xbdch veli\xc4\x8din. \r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99edpokl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1 se, \xc5\xbee \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 m\xc3\xa1 znalosti programovac\xc3\xadho jazyka C a orientuje se v z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch pojmech mikroprocesorov\xc3\xa9 techniky. \r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola popisuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf ATmega644, rozm\xc3\xadst\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf na pouzd\xc5\x99e, AVR j\xc3\xa1dro a pam\xc4\x9bti, vstupn\xc4\x9b/v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xad porty a jejich konfiguraci. \r\n\r\nDruh\xc3\xa1 kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9 prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad AVR Studio v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b prvn\xc3\xadho p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu a d\xc3\xa1le seznamuje s celo\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadseln\xc3\xbdmi datov\xc3\xbdmi typy. \r\n\r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola se zab\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 technikou tabulkov\xc3\xa9 transformace a ukazuje \xc3\xbasporu datov\xc3\xa9 pam\xc4\x9bti v p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpad\xc4\x9b, \xc5\xbee je transforma\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad tabulka um\xc3\xadst\xc4\x9bna do pam\xc4\x9bti programu. \r\n\r\n\xc4\x8ctvrt\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje techniku programov\xc3\xa9ho o\xc5\xa1et\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kmit\xc5\xaf tla\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtek a sou\xc4\x8dasnou obsluhu v\xc3\xadce tla\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtek s p\xc5\x99evodem na pozi\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad k\xc3\xb3d. D\xc3\xa1le seznamuje s technikou rozd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad zdrojov\xc3\xa9ho k\xc3\xb3du do modul\xc5\xaf. \r\n\r\nP\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje obsluhu LCD modulu, ukazuje tak\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99esm\xc4\x9brov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad standardn\xc3\xadho v\xc3\xbdstupu funkce printf pro v\xc3\xbdpis na LCD. \r\n\r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 a sedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola jsou v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny obsluze rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de a maticov\xc3\xa9 kl\xc3\xa1vesnice. \r\n\r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje pojem p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad, seznamuje s mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xbdmi zdroji p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad u mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru ATmega644, \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xadm obsluhy p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad, konkretizuje informace ke vstup\xc5\xafm vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\nDev\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje vlastnosti \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 0. Des\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola p\xc5\x99in\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 0 v re\xc5\xbeimu \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de, jeden\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadch v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 0. \r\n\r\nDvan\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje sb\xc4\x9brnici SPI a obvod MCP4921 (D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk pro SPI). \r\n\r\nT\xc5\x99in\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na popisu \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 1. \r\n\r\n\xc4\x8ctrn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de v re\xc5\xbeimu \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de. Jsou zde prezentov\xc3\xa1ny r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 techniky m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu. \r\n\r\nPatn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje mo\xc5\xbenosti analogov\xc3\xa9ho kompar\xc3\xa1toru a jeho pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99i m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad elektrick\xc3\xbdch i neelektrick\xc3\xbdch veli\xc4\x8din. \r\n\r\n\xc5\xa0estn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 a sedmn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola se zab\xc3\xbdvaj\xc3\xad popisem a pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm zabudovan\xc3\xa9ho A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku. \r\n\r\nOsmn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 a devaten\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola jsou v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny jednotce USART. S\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xa1 linka je zde pou\xc5\xbeita pro komunikaci s mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9rem ATtiny2313, kter\xc3\xbd ovl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1 LCD displej. \r\n\r\nDvac\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 a jednadvac\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuj\xc3\xad jednotku TWI a obvod MCP23008 (8bitov\xc3\xbd expand\xc3\xa9r). \r\n\r\nV p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloze najdete sch\xc3\xa9ma jednotliv\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravk\xc5\xaf: COM644KIT (levn\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xbd kit pro ATmega644), M8LED (osmice LED), M7SEG (7segmentovka), MLEDSW (kombinovan\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravek s LED a tla\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtky), MLCD (textov\xc3\xbd LCD modul), MROTSW (rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8d), MMATKBD (maticov\xc3\xa1 kl\xc3\xa1vesnice), MPIEZO (piezom\xc4\x9bni\xc4\x8d), MDYNDSP (dynamicky \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xbd displej), MSPIDAC (12bitov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xbd SPI), MRX555 (gener\xc3\xa1tor sign\xc3\xa1lu s NE555), MACRX (m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad odporu p\xc5\x99evodem na \xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xbd interval), MADTEST (testovac\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravek pro A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk), MLCDGEN (LCD \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xbd s\xc3\xa9riovou linkou), MI2CEXP8 (8bitov\xc3\xbd expand\xc3\xa9r \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xbd I2C). \r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - prosinec 2013 - ISBN 978-80-7300-492-7\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - prosinec 2013 - ISBN 978-80-7300-493-4  (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\tobsah knihy\r\n\r\n\t\xc3\x9avod do mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf ATmega - z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti, vstupn\xc4\x9b/v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xad porty, z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad periferie.\r\n\tVytv\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad aplikace, simulace, ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1vrhu.\r\n\tDek\xc3\xb3dov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad stav\xc5\xaf skupiny LED pomoc\xc3\xad pole konstant (dekod\xc3\xa9r pro 7segmentovku).\r\n\t\xc4\x8cten\xc3\xad stavu tla\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtek - o\xc5\xa1et\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kmit\xc5\xaf tla\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtka, pozi\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad k\xc3\xb3d pro \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xad skupiny tla\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtek.\r\n\tLCD modul a jeho obsluha - vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad skupiny funkc\xc3\xad pro \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad LCD modulu.\r\n\tRota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8d a jeho obsluha.\r\n\tMaticov\xc3\xa1 kl\xc3\xa1vesnice a jej\xc3\xad obsluha - pozi\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad k\xc3\xb3d.\r\n\tP\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad, vstupy vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad - obsluha rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de p\xc5\x99es p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad.\r\n\t\xc4\x8c\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8d 0 - popis.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 0 v re\xc5\xbeimu \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de - generov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad t\xc3\xb3nu, blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED, obsluha dynamicky \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9ho displeje, digit\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad stopky.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadch v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 0 - PWM gener\xc3\xa1tor, laditeln\xc3\xbd gener\xc3\xa1tor sign\xc3\xa1lu.\r\n\tS\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbd kan\xc3\xa1l SPI - \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku pomoc\xc3\xad rota\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de.\r\n\t\xc4\x8c\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8d 1 - popis.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 1 v re\xc5\xbeimu \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8de - m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu.\r\n\tAnalogov\xc3\xbd kompar\xc3\xa1tor a jeho pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad - m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad odporu mezip\xc5\x99evodem na \xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xbd interval.\r\n\tA/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk - popis.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku - programov\xc3\xa9 spou\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad, re\xc5\xbeim voln\xc3\xa9ho b\xc4\x9bhu, spou\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad pomoc\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de.\r\n\tJednotka USART - Z toho d\xc5\xafvodu ani nem\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee podat \xc3\xbapln\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99ehled a nen\xc3\xad ani p\xc5\x99esn\xc3\xbdm n\xc3\xa1vodem k pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nText je rozd\xc4\x9blen do t\xc5\x99\xc3\xad celk\xc5\xaf. V prvn\xc3\xadm jsou vysv\xc4\x9btleny z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti obvod\xc5\xaf v proudov\xc3\xa9m m\xc3\xb3du a \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad jednoduch\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf s nimi. Druh\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st je \xc3\xbavodem do problematiky elektrick\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf, jsou uvedeny principy jak LC, aktivn\xc3\xadch RC (ARC) a \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf, tak filtr\xc5\xaf se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi kapacitory a proudy. T\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st pak pojedn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 o n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xbdch aplikac\xc3\xadch smy\xc4\x8dky f\xc3\xa1zov\xc3\xa9ho z\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9bsu.\r\n\r\nProto\xc5\xbee pro pochopen\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dinnosti obvodu jsou vhodn\xc3\xa9 heuristick\xc3\xa9 metody anal\xc3\xbdzy, vych\xc3\xa1zej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad z Ohmova a obou Kirchhoffov\xc3\xbdch z\xc3\xa1kon\xc5\xaf (nebo\xc5\xa5 z nich plyne princip \xc4\x8dinnosti) zat\xc3\xadmco pro anal\xc3\xbdzu slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf jsou vhodn\xc3\xa9 metody algoritmick\xc3\xa9 (kter\xc3\xa9 vedou k c\xc3\xadli mnohem snadn\xc4\x9bji, ne\xc5\xbeli aplikace z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch z\xc3\xa1kon\xc5\xaf, poskytuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch soustavu rovnic v takov\xc3\xbdchto p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpadech nep\xc5\x99ehlednou), jsou v\xc5\xbedy u slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf (s proudov\xc3\xbdmi konvejory a transimpedan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadmi opera\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadmi zesilova\xc4\x8di, se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi proudy a sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi kapacitory) nejprve vysv\xc4\x9btleny element\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti heuristicky (tedy u\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm Ohmova a Kirchhoffov\xc3\xbdch z\xc3\xa1kon\xc5\xaf), jimi\xc5\xbe je odvozen maticov\xc3\xbd z\xc3\xa1pis s t\xc3\xadm, \xc5\xbee obvody slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad se \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad ji\xc5\xbe algoritmicky t\xc4\x9bmito maticemi.\r\n\r\nV \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti pojedn\xc3\xa1vaj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad o filtrech jsou krom\xc4\x9b obecn\xc3\xbdch princip\xc5\xaf Inteligentn\xc3\xad budovy by m\xc4\x9bly b\xc3\xbdt trval\xc3\xa9, zdrav\xc3\xa9, technologicky na v\xc3\xbd\xc5\xa1i, m\xc4\x9bly by spl\xc5\x88ovat pot\xc5\x99eby sv\xc3\xbdch obyvatel\xc5\xaf i podnik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a m\xc4\x9bly by b\xc3\xbdt flexibiln\xc3\xad a p\xc5\x99izp\xc5\xafsobiteln\xc3\xa9 po\xc5\xbeadovan\xc3\xbdm zm\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xa1m, m\xc4\x9bly by odr\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbeet sv\xc5\xafj vybudovan\xc3\xbd syst\xc3\xa9m ve tvorb\xc4\x9b kvalitn\xc3\xadho vnit\xc5\x99n\xc3\xadho a vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99i spln\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad ekologick\xc3\xbdch a efektivn\xc3\xadch hodnot. To znamen\xc3\xa1, \xc5\xbee n\xc3\xa1vrh, konstrukce, technick\xc3\xa9 vybaven\xc3\xad i spr\xc3\xa1va budov by si m\xc4\x9bly b\xc3\xbdt co do d\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeitosti rovny. Budovy obsahuj\xc3\xad mnoho syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf sestrojen\xc3\xbdch mnoha lidmi a p\xc5\x99esto vztah mezi budovami a lidmi m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee uspokojiv\xc4\x9b fungovat pouze tehdy, jestli\xc5\xbee existuje integrace mezi v\xc5\xa1emi t\xc4\x9bmito syst\xc3\xa9my a mozky, je\xc5\xbe je navrhovaly. V\xc3\xbdb\xc4\x9br skv\xc4\x9bl\xc3\xbdch hr\xc3\xa1\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf je\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9b nezaru\xc4\x8duje dobr\xc3\xbd orchestr nebo \xc3\xbasp\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbd fotbalov\xc3\xbd t\xc3\xbdm. Syst\xc3\xa9mov\xc3\xa9 my\xc5\xa1len\xc3\xad je nezbytn\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99i navrhov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad budov spolu s talentem, jen\xc5\xbe tvo\xc5\x99\xc3\xad, inovuje, a p\xc5\x99esto z\xc5\xafst\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 b\xc3\xbdt praktick\xc3\xa9 a je v\xc5\xbedy orientovan\xc3\xa9 na maxim\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad jednoduchost. Toto v\xc5\xa1e vy\xc5\xbeaduje nejenom technickou schopnost, ale nav\xc3\xadc schopnost dobr\xc3\xa9 interpretace, oko\xc5\x99en\xc4\x9bnou p\xc5\x99edstavivost\xc3\xad a dokonce intuic\xc3\xad. Nakonec, budovy tvo\xc5\x99\xc3\xad na\xc5\xa1i architektonickou krajinu, a tyto budovy, i prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad, je\xc5\xbe vytv\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99ej\xc3\xad, by m\xc4\x9bly povzn\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1et du\xc5\xa1i a n\xc3\xa1ladu lid\xc3\xad uvnit\xc5\x99, jako\xc5\xbe i t\xc4\x9bch, co jen jdou kolem.\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\t\xc3\x9avod - pro\xc4\x8d knihu \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadst\r\n\tInteligentn\xc3\xad budovy a udr\xc5\xbeiteln\xc3\xa1 v\xc3\xbdstavba\r\n\tInteligence inteligentn\xc3\xadch budov\r\n\tObnoviteln\xc3\xa9 zdroje energie v inherenci s inteligentn\xc3\xad budovou\r\n\tN\xc3\xa1vrh inteligentn\xc3\xad budovy\r\n\tFacility Management\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF\r\n\tuk\xc3\xa1zka knihy - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF\r\n\r\n\tupdate - zat\xc3\xadm \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xbd nen\xc3\xad\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\nRecenze lektor\xc5\xaf a reakce \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf\r\n\r\n\trecenze Prof. Ing. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-450-7', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nKniha pojedn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 o elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9m poli netradi\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadm zp\xc5\xafsobem. Vych\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad z p\xc4\x9bti srozumiteln\xc3\xbdch postul\xc3\xa1t\xc5\xaf z\xc3\xadskan\xc3\xbdch ze zku\xc5\xa1enosti ka\xc5\xbedodenn\xc3\xadho \xc5\xbeivota a stav\xc3\xad na element\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch my\xc5\xa1lenkov\xc3\xbdch experimentech, z nich\xc5\xbe odvozuje Maxwellovy rovnice a z\xc3\xa1kony elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9ho pole. V druh\xc3\xa9m vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad autor z\xc3\xbaro\xc4\x8dil zku\xc5\xa1enosti z prvn\xc3\xadho vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a nov\xc4\x9b formuluje n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xa9 pas\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbee. T\xc3\xbdk\xc3\xa1 se to hlavn\xc4\x9b vektoru potenci\xc3\xa1lu magnetick\xc3\xa9ho pole a hustoty energie magnetick\xc3\xa9ho pole, ale i kapitoly o z\xc3\xa1konn\xc3\xbdch m\xc4\x9brn\xc3\xbdch jednotk\xc3\xa1ch. Druh\xc3\xa9 vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad je dopln\xc4\x9bno nov\xc3\xbdmi odd\xc3\xadly. Sta\xc5\xa5 Rovnice kontinuity pom\xc3\xa1h\xc3\xa1 pochopit &quot;podivn\xc3\xbd&quot; Maxwell\xc5\xafv proud. V pojedn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad o elektrostatick\xc3\xa9m a magnetostatick\xc3\xa9m poli z pohledu speci\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad teorie relativity se odvozuje Ampere\xc5\xafv z\xc3\xa1kon jako d\xc5\xafsledek elektrick\xc3\xbdch sil dvou liniov\xc3\xbdch n\xc3\xa1boj\xc5\xaf, \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadm\xc5\xbe se redukuje po\xc4\x8det p\xc5\xafvodn\xc3\xadch p\xc4\x9bti postul\xc3\xa1t\xc5\xaf na \xc4\x8dty\xc5\x99i. V tomto pojedn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad se tak\xc3\xa9 objasn\xc3\xad, pro\xc4\x8d molekul\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad proudy ve feromagnetik\xc3\xa1ch posiluj\xc3\xad magnetick\xc3\xa9 pole vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch proud\xc5\xaf. V nov\xc3\xa9m odd\xc3\xadlu se sn\xc3\xad\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xa1 rychlost elektromagnetick\xc3\xbdch vln v l\xc3\xa1tkov\xc3\xa9m prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad d\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 do souvislosti s indexem lomu sv\xc4\x9btla a vysv\xc4\x9btluje se to z pozic QED - kvantov\xc3\xa9 elektrodynamiky.\r\n\r\nSpis je m\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn jako u\xc4\x8debn\xc3\xad pom\xc5\xafcka pro vysok\xc3\xa9 \xc5\xa1koly technick\xc3\xa9ho zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad. Dostupn\xc3\xa9 publikace dnes p\xc5\x99edkl\xc3\xa1daj\xc3\xad tuto l\xc3\xa1tku sp\xc3\xad\xc5\xa1e ve form\xc4\x9b sb\xc3\xadrky hotov\xc3\xbdch matematick\xc3\xbdch formul\xc3\xad, a tak \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99e u\xc4\x8d\xc3\xad memorovat a mechanicky po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtat s nimi. Tato publikace v\xc5\xa1ak odvozuje z\xc3\xa1kony a rovnice elektromagnetick\xc3\xbdch pol\xc3\xad a u\xc4\x8d\xc3\xad in\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xbdrsky myslet a matematicky se vyjad\xc5\x99ovat.\r\n\r\nAni v dne\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xadm sv\xc4\x9bte po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf a internetu bychom nem\xc4\x9bli zapom\xc3\xadnat na z\xc3\xa1klady, ze kter\xc3\xbdch tyto technick\xc3\xa9 vymo\xc5\xbeenosti vyr\xc5\xafstaj\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - listopad 2003 - ISBN 80-7300-096-2\r\n\t2. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - kv\xc4\x9bten 2012 - ISBN 978-80-7300-450-7\r\n\t2. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - kv\xc4\x9bten 2012 - ISBN 978-80-7300-451-4 (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\tPocta zakladatel\xc5\xafm\r\n\tElektrostatick\xc3\xa9 pole\r\n\tMagnetostatick\xc3\xa9 pole\r\n\tNestacion\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9 pole\r\n\tZ\xc3\xa1konn\xc3\xa9 m\xc4\x9brn\xc3\xa9 jednotky\r\n\tP\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloha\r\n\tRejst\xc5\x99\xc3\xadk, Seznam u\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xbdch symbol\xc5\xaf\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF\r\n\tuk\xc3\xa1zka knihy - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF\r\n\r\n\tupdate:\r\n\r\n\tvyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad 1.
