Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN=None, description='Knihu vydali auto\xc5\x99i sami vlastn\xc3\xadm n\xc3\xa1kladem !!!\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\tobsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTato kniha je 4. d\xc3\xadlem na\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad mal\xc3\xa9 s\xc3\xa9rie publikac\xc3\xad o programov\xc3\xa9m syst\xc3\xa9mu MATLAB\xc2\xae. P\xc5\x99edchoz\xc3\xad d\xc3\xadly byly v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny \xc3\xbapln\xc3\xbdm z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xafm pr\xc3\xa1ce, programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad vlastn\xc3\xadch aplikac\xc3\xad s podporou grafiky a \xc3\xbavodu do pr\xc3\xa1ce se sign\xc3\xa1ly. Pojmy sign\xc3\xa1l a syst\xc3\xa9m (soustava) jsou spolu nerozlu\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b sv\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1ny tak, jako p\xc5\x99\xc3\xad\xc4\x8dina s n\xc3\xa1sledkem. Jedno tvo\xc5\x99\xc3\xad druh\xc3\xa9 a ob\xc4\x9b \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti se mohou navz\xc3\xa1jem ovliv\xc5\x88ovat. Bez zkoum\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1lu nen\xc3\xad mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 zjistit nic o stavu syst\xc3\xa9mu a naopak, sign\xc3\xa1ly jsou pochopiteln\xc4\x9b generov\xc3\xa1ny n\xc4\x9bjak\xc3\xbdmi syst\xc3\xa9my. Logicky je tedy z\xc5\x99ejm\xc3\xa9, \xc5\xbee po knize o sign\xc3\xa1lech n\xc3\xa1sleduje kniha o syst\xc3\xa9mech. \r\n\r\nTato kniha je op\xc4\x9bt v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na zejm\xc3\xa9na, ale nejenom, za\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1te\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadk\xc5\xafm a p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadle\xc5\xbeitostn\xc3\xbdm u\xc5\xbeivatel\xc5\xafm syst\xc3\xa9mu MATLAB. P\xc5\x99i jej\xc3\xadm psan\xc3\xad jsme se \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddili stejn\xc3\xbdmi principy, jako u p\xc5\x99edchoz\xc3\xadch d\xc3\xadl\xc5\xaf. \xc5\xa0lo n\xc3\xa1m zejm\xc3\xa9na o srozumitelnost, p\xc5\x99im\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xa9 propojen\xc3\xad teoretick\xc3\xbdch z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf s aplika\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadmi komentovan\xc3\xbdmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady a d\xc5\xafkladn\xc3\xa9 vysv\xc4\x9btlen\xc3\xad podstaty ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa9ho pojmu nebo jevu. Domn\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1me se, \xc5\xbee ke kvalitn\xc3\xad pr\xc3\xa1ci s knihou vedou zejm\xc3\xa9na tyto p\xc5\x99edpoklady: chu\xc5\xa5 \xc4\x8di nutnost se n\xc4\x9bco nau\xc4\x8dit, po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d se spu\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbdm MATLAB (leg\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad licence), pozn\xc3\xa1mkov\xc3\xbd blok a dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad kvalitn\xc3\xad dopl\xc5\x88kov\xc3\xa1 literatura, kterou vyu\xc5\xbeijete p\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm pro dopln\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad teorie ve va\xc5\xa1em oboru \xc4\x8di zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\t\xc3\x9avod\r\n\tSyst\xc3\xa9my a jejich modely\r\n\tPr\xc3\xa1ce se syst\xc3\xa9my v prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad MATLAB\r\n\tStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd \xc3\xbavod do syst\xc3\xa9mu Simulink\r\n\tP\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady pr\xc3\xa1ce se syst\xc3\xa9my\r\n\tZ\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9br\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - ve form\xc3\xa1tu DOC\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\tupdate - zat\xc3\xadm \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xbd nen\xc3\xad\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nRecenze lektor\xc5\xaf a reakce \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf\r\n\r\n\trecenze\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nOdkazy\r\n\r\n\tzat\xc3\xadm \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xa9 nejsou\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nKeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nobecn\xc3\xa1 charakteristika\r\n\r\nslova\r\n\r\n\r\nobsah knihy\r\n\r\nobsah\r\n\r\n\r\nrejst\xc5\x99\xc3\xadk knihy\r\n\r\nrejst\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkov\xc3\xa1 slova', language=None, format=None, URL='http://shop.ben.cz/cz/114257-matlab-zaciname-se-systemy.aspx', binding='bro\xc5\xbeovan\xc3\xa1 V2', EAN=None, sub_title=None, is_ebook=False, edition='1. \xc4\x8desk\xc3\xa9', pub_date=None, pages='256 stran B5'), title='Matlab - za\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadn\xc3\xa1me se syst\xc3\xa9my', price='0,00 K\xc4\x8d', authors=[])

Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-408-8', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nPublikace &quot;Z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad elektronick\xc3\xa9 obvody&quot; je rozd\xc4\x9blena do t\xc5\x99\xc3\xad hlavn\xc3\xadch \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad pojedn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 o z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch principech nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xadch zdroj\xc3\xadch line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch (analogov\xc3\xbdch) a sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdch. Jsou zde rozebr\xc3\xa1ny jednotliv\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch zdroj\xc5\xaf, tj.: transform\xc3\xa1tory, usm\xc4\x9br\xc5\x88ova\xc4\x8de, stabiliz\xc3\xa1tory a filtry, a je pops\xc3\xa1na jejich \xc4\x8dinnost. D\xc3\xa1le je vysv\xc4\x9btlen d\xc5\xafvod mal\xc3\xa9 energetick\xc3\xa9 \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dinnosti a princip jej\xc3\xadho zv\xc3\xbd\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi zdroji.\r\n\r\nVe druh\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti je rozebr\xc3\xa1na funkce zesilova\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf s tranzistory, s opera\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadmi zesilova\xc4\x8di, a zesilova\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf v\xc3\xbdkonov\xc3\xbdch. U tranzistorov\xc3\xbdch zesilova\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf je pops\xc3\xa1no nastaven\xc3\xad pracovn\xc3\xadho bodu, graficko-po\xc4\x8detn\xc3\xad \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad jednostup\xc5\x88ov\xc3\xa9ho zesilova\xc4\x8de a problematika zesilova\xc4\x8de s odporov\xc4\x9b-kapacitn\xc3\xad vazbou. D\xc3\xa1le jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny vybran\xc3\xa9 line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad a neline\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad obvody s opera\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadmi zesilova\xc4\x8di.\r\n\r\nVe t\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti jsou pak pops\xc3\xa1ny z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad RC harmonick\xc3\xa9 a neharmonick\xc3\xa9 oscil\xc3\xa1tory a LC harmonick\xc3\xa9 oscil\xc3\xa1tory a oscil\xc3\xa1tory \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 krystalem. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-406-4', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTato kniha je ur\xc4\x8dena v\xc5\xa1em z\xc3\xa1jemc\xc5\xafm o programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf \xc5\x99ady Atmel AVR XMEGA A4. D\xc5\xafraz je kladen na typ ATxmega16A4. V textu jsou interpretov\xc3\xa1ny a formou p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad\xc5\xaf p\xc5\x99edvedeny nejpodstatn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad periferie. Knihu pak lze pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadt pro sezn\xc3\xa1men\xc3\xad s mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry XMEGA a budov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch aplikac\xc3\xad. P\xc5\x99edpokl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1 se, \xc5\xbee \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 m\xc3\xa1 znalosti programovac\xc3\xadho jazyka C a orientujete se v z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch pojmech mikroprocesorov\xc3\xa9 techniky.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola popisuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf XMEGA A4, rozm\xc3\xadst\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf na pouzd\xc5\x99e, AVR j\xc3\xa1dro a pam\xc4\x9bti.\r\n\r\nVe druh\xc3\xa9 kapitole se sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xadme se vstupn\xc4\x9b/v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadmi porty a jejich konfigurac\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1ovac\xc3\xad syst\xc3\xa9m, \xc3\xbarove\xc5\x88 a prioritu p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad a v\xc3\xadce\xc3\xbarov\xc5\x88ov\xc3\xbd \xc5\x99adi\xc4\x8d p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad PMIC.\r\n\r\nVe \xc4\x8dtvrt\xc3\xa9 kapitole se prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 jednotka TC - 16bitov\xc3\xbd \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d/\xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8d, kter\xc3\xa1 podporuje funkci z\xc3\xa1chytn\xc3\xa9ho registru, v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadho kompar\xc3\xa1toru a PWM.\r\n\r\nP\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola p\xc5\x99edv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad jednotky TC, komplikovan\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady jsou za\xc5\x99azeny do kapitoly 9.\r\n\r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 kapitola prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 roz\xc5\xa1i\xc5\x99uj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad jednotky AWeX a Hi-Res, kter\xc3\xa9 dopl\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xad jednotku TC zejm\xc3\xa9na o mo\xc5\xbenosti \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad motor\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nSedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje zabudovan\xc3\xbd dvoukan\xc3\xa1lov\xc3\xbd 12bitov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk.\r\n\r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje syst\xc3\xa9m distribuce hodinov\xc3\xa9ho sign\xc3\xa1lu a mo\xc5\xbenosti nastaven\xc3\xad hodin. Pro taktov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad lze pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvat rozli\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9 zabudovan\xc3\xa9 gener\xc3\xa1tory hodin nebo vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad krystalov\xc3\xa9 oscil\xc3\xa1tory. N\xc3\xa1soben\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu je mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 pomoc\xc3\xad PLL (f\xc3\xa1zov\xc3\xa9ho z\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9bsu).\r\n\r\nDev\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 ud\xc3\xa1lostn\xc3\xad syst\xc3\xa9m. Ud\xc3\xa1lostn\xc3\xad syst\xc3\xa9m je d\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xbd pro komplexn\xc3\xad techniku \xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad periferi\xc3\xad. Sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad je kvadraturn\xc3\xad dekod\xc3\xa9r, kter\xc3\xbd umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uje snadno realizovat inkrement\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d.\r\n\r\nDes\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na DMAC - \xc5\x99adi\xc4\x8di p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadm\xc3\xa9ho p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstupu do pam\xc4\x9bti. DMAC dovoluje prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99esun\xc5\xaf dat mezi periferiemi a pam\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad bez spolu\xc3\xba\xc4\x8dasti j\xc3\xa1dra procesoru a tak lze dosahovat mnohem vy\xc5\xa1\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch rychlost\xc3\xad operac\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\nJeden\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje 12kan\xc3\xa1lov\xc3\xbd 12bitov\xc3\xbd A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk.\r\n\r\nDvan\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola p\xc5\x99edstavuje stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99ehled dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch periferi\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\nV p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloze naleznete sch\xc3\xa9ma jednotliv\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravk\xc5\xaf: XMEGABOARD (levn\xc3\xbd v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xbd kit pro XMEGA A4), M8LED (osmice LED), MSVORKY (svorky pro p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xad k jednotliv\xc3\xbdm bit\xc5\xafm portu), MDAC8 (vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad 8bitov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk), MADTEST (testovac\xc3\xad modulu pro A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk).\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady\r\n\r\n\tProgramov\xc3\xa9 blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED.\r\n\tBlik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED p\xc5\x99es p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad.\r\n\t\xc5\x98\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad jasu LED p\xc5\x99es PWM.\r\n\tObd\xc3\xa9ln\xc3\xadkov\xc3\xbd gener\xc3\xa1tor pomoc\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadho kompar\xc3\xa1toru.\r\n\tSinusov\xc3\xbd gener\xc3\xa1tor realizovan\xc3\xbd zabudovan\xc3\xbdm D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadkem.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad vnit\xc5\x99n\xc3\xadho oscil\xc3\xa1toru 32 MHz.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad vnit\xc5\x99n\xc3\xadho oscil\xc3\xa1toru 32 MHz a PLL.\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad vn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadho krystalu a PLL.\r\n\tM\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu s pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm re\xc5\xbeimu capture a ud\xc3\xa1lostn\xc3\xadho syst\xc3\xa9mu.\r\n\tKvadraturn\xc3\xad dekod\xc3\xa9r (inkrement\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad \xc4\x8didlo pro regulaci nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad).\r\n\tGenerov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bhu pomoc\xc3\xad DMA, 1. pokus.\r\n\tGenerov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bhu pomoc\xc3\xad DMA, 2. pokus.\r\n\tProgramov\xc3\xa9 spou\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad A/D p\xc5\x99evodu.\r\n\tRe\xc5\xbeim voln\xc3\xa9ho b\xc4\x9bhu A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku s pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm DMA.\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - prosinec 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-406-4\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - prosinec 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-433-0 Text je budov\xc3\xa1n tak, aby \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 mohl postupn\xc4\x9b vlastn\xc3\xadmi silami pochopit objektov\xc3\xa9 programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad v jazyce C++. V\xc3\xbdklad je dopln\xc4\x9bn celkem 39 \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xbdmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad odli\xc5\xa1nosti mezi jazyky C a C++ bez ohledu na objektov\xc3\xa9 vlastnosti. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se zejm\xc3\xa9na o p\xc5\x99et\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbeovan\xc3\xad a implicitn\xc3\xad parametry funkc\xc3\xad, vol\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad odkazem a pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad proud\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nVe druh\xc3\xa9 kapitole se sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xadme se z\xc3\xa1klady objektov\xc3\xa9ho programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad v C++. Budou vysv\xc4\x9btleny pojmy: zapouzd\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad, atribut, metoda, \xc3\xbarove\xc5\x88 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstupu, konstruktor a destruktor.\r\n\r\nKapitoly 3 a 4 vysv\xc4\x9btluj\xc3\xad d\xc4\x9bdi\xc4\x8dnost a spojen\xc3\xa9 pojmy jako polymorfismus, virtu\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad metody, RTTI, abstraktn\xc3\xad t\xc5\x99\xc3\xaddy, \xc4\x8dist\xc3\xa9 virtu\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad metody.\r\n\r\nV p\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa9 kapitole se prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdjimky a jsou dopln\xc4\x9bny informace o oper\xc3\xa1torech new a delete.\r\n\r\nKapitoly 6 a 7 prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99et\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbeov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad oper\xc3\xa1tor\xc5\xaf. Formou praktick\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad\xc5\xaf je uk\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1no p\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xad oper\xc3\xa1tor\xc5\xaf pro pr\xc3\xa1ci s komplexn\xc3\xadmi \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadsly a realizace t\xc5\x99\xc3\xaddy pro pr\xc3\xa1ci s \xc5\x99et\xc4\x9bzci. Tato kniha v\xc3\xa1m pom\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee proniknout do z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf regula\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad techniky pomoc\xc3\xad mnoha praktick\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou naprogramov\xc3\xa1ny v prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad Matlab/Simulink v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b virtu\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad reality. Ta velmi n\xc3\xa1zorn\xc4\x9b prezentuje regula\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad d\xc4\x9bje. \r\n\r\nKniha Regula\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad technika v p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladech si neklade za c\xc3\xadl pouze sezn\xc3\xa1mit \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99e se z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadmi pojmy v oblasti modelov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad dynamick\xc3\xbdch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf ale zejm\xc3\xa9na to, aby \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 pochopil mnoh\xc3\xa9 souvislosti p\xc5\x99i samostatn\xc3\xa9m \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad zadan\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbaloh. Proto se ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa1 kapitola skl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1 ze t\xc5\x99\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad, prvn\xc3\xad je stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9 shrnut\xc3\xad teorie, druh\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st obsahuje v\xc3\xbdkladov\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady a t\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st obsahuje zad\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad ne\xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbaloh s p\xc5\x99ilo\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xbdmi v\xc3\xbdsledky. Kniha d\xc3\xa1le obsahuje p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadlohy, kde jsou shrnuty z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad matematick\xc3\xa9 pojmy, kter\xc3\xa9 obor vyu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1.\r\n \r\nKniha vznikala v pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bhu posledn\xc3\xadch p\xc4\x9bti let a auto\xc5\x99i v n\xc3\xad uplatnili sv\xc3\xa9 studentsk\xc3\xa9, pedagogick\xc3\xa9 a zejm\xc3\xa9na praktick\xc3\xa9 dovednosti v oblasti \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad re\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xbdch laboratorn\xc3\xadch model\xc5\xaf. Z\xc3\xa1jemce m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee pochopit podstatu dan\xc3\xa9 metody, dov\xc3\xad se podm\xc3\xadnky pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad\r\na z\xc3\xadsk\xc3\xa1 odkazy na dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad zdroje. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-428-6', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTato kniha pod\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 ve dvou d\xc3\xadlech p\xc5\x99ehled metod u\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xbdch k \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch elektrick\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf. Z\xc3\xa1jemce m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee pochopit podstatu dan\xc3\xa9 metody, dov\xc3\xad se podm\xc3\xadnky pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad\r\na z\xc3\xadsk\xc3\xa1 odkazy na dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad zdroje. Metody jsou dopln\xc4\x9bny v nezbytn\xc3\xa9m mno\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xad \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xbdmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady pro vyjasn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad dan\xc3\xa9 v\xc4\x9bci. Kniha by m\xc4\x9bla slou\xc5\xbeit jako p\xc5\x99ehled z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch informac\xc3\xad o dan\xc3\xa9m probl\xc3\xa9mu. Je ur\xc4\x8dena v\xc5\xa1em kter\xc3\xa9 tyto v\xc4\x9bci zaj\xc3\xadmaj\xc3\xad. Kniha obsahuje i jist\xc3\xbd pod\xc3\xadl matematiky, co\xc5\xbe dnes neb\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadli\xc5\xa1 popul\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad, ale bez n\xc4\x9bho nelze podat solidn\xc3\xad a v\xc4\x9bcn\xc4\x9b spr\xc3\xa1vn\xc3\xa9 vysv\xc4\x9btlen\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad d\xc3\xadl knihy je zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en na z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad metody u\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xa9 pro \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch elektrick\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf. V prvn\xc3\xad kapitole je pops\xc3\xa1no \xc4\x8dlen\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad teorie line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf,\r\njej\xc3\xad souvislost s teori\xc3\xad elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9ho pole, omezen\xc3\xad kter\xc3\xa1 tyto teorie maj\xc3\xad a vztah t\xc4\x9bchto teori\xc3\xad k pozn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad sv\xc4\x9bta. Ve druh\xc3\xa9 kapitole jsou vysv\xc4\x9btleny z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad\r\npojmy, veli\xc4\x8diny a z\xc3\xa1kony u\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xa9 v teorii obvod\xc5\xaf. Vych\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad se z obecn\xc3\xbdch definic veli\xc4\x8din, aby bylo mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 uk\xc3\xa1zat jejich vztah k teorii elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9ho pole. U jednotek veli\xc4\x8din je uk\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1n jejich vztah k z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadm jednotk\xc3\xa1m soustavy SI pomoc\xc3\xad jednotkov\xc3\xbdch rovnic. V dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch kapitol\xc3\xa1ch jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 metody \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad elektrick\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf a v z\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9bru knihy je\r\nkapitola o mo\xc5\xbenostech vyu\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad popsan\xc3\xbdch metod \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad i v jin\xc3\xbdch oblastech elektrotechniky, \xc4\x8di v neelektrotechnick\xc3\xbdch oborech. T\xc3\xadm je upozorn\xc4\x9bno na to, \xc5\xbee teorie line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1 dob\xc5\x99e propracovan\xc3\xa9 metody, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou pou\xc5\xbeiteln\xc3\xa9 i jinde a m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee m\xc3\xadt proto \xc5\xa1ir\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad vyu\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nElektrotechnika a tedy i teorie line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf jsou z hlediska historie pom\xc4\x9brn\xc4\x9b mlad\xc3\xa9 v\xc4\x9bdy. Z\xc3\xa1klady lze sledovat od t\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dtvrtiny 18. stolet\xc3\xad, kdy byl zkonstruov\xc3\xa1n kondenz\xc3\xa1tor. V pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bhu 19. stolet\xc3\xad fyzikov\xc3\xa9 objevili z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kony Ohm\xc5\xafv a oba Kirchhoffovy, ze kter\xc3\xbdch mohla vych\xc3\xa1zet teorie line\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf. Dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad metody \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad vypracovali ji\xc5\xbe v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1inou elektrotechnikov\xc3\xa9, podle toho jak si to \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dala praxe v pr\xc5\xafb\xc4\x9bhu 19. a 20. stolet\xc3\xad. U metod \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad nebo v\xc3\xbdznamn\xc3\xbdch zapojen\xc3\xad zapojen\xc3\xad jsem se sna\xc5\xbeil pokud mo\xc5\xbeno uv\xc3\xa9st tak\xc3\xa9 jejich autory s odkazem na p\xc5\xafvodn\xc3\xad zdroje, aby tito badatel\xc3\xa9 jejich\xc5\xbe d\xc3\xadlo je u\xc5\xbeite\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9 mnoh\xc3\xbdm, nebyli zapomenuti.\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - In the first part of the paper there is described the instruction on how to proceed step by step. The Life Cycle Check helps to identify where the environmental impacts lie and to identify on which stage of lifecycle we should focus on to reduce the negative environmental impact. To obtain a complete overview of environmental issues of the product system can be used a tool called the MECO matrix. The next part of a paper is demonstrated on practical example that is focused on the life assessment of a fruit dryer. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-413-2', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nKniha je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na popisu a\xc2\xa0praktick\xc3\xbdm aplikac\xc3\xadm mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf PIC18F452 a\xc2\xa0PIC18F1220 v\xc2\xa0jazyce C.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti obou typ\xc5\xaf mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9ho popisu jednotliv\xc3\xbdch zabudovan\xc3\xbdch periferi\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nVe\xc2\xa0druh\xc3\xa9 kapitole jsme sezn\xc3\xa1meni s\xc2\xa0minim\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadmi po\xc5\xbeadavky na\xc2\xa0programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad. Je tedy uvedena instalace pot\xc5\x99ebn\xc3\xbdch program\xc5\xaf, pops\xc3\xa1ny v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9 desky PKIT452 a\xc2\xa0PKIT1220 a\xc2\xa0jednoduch\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravek se\xc2\xa0sv\xc3\xadtiv\xc3\xbdmi diodami M8LED.\r\n\r\nN\xc3\xa1sleduje t\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola, kde je p\xc5\x99edvedeno vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad prvn\xc3\xadho p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu \xe2\x80\x93 blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED.\r\n\r\n\xc4\x8ctvrt\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje vstupn\xc4\x9b/v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xad porty, tedy jejich po\xc4\x8det, alternativn\xc3\xad funkci v\xc3\xbdvod\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0konfiguraci.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0p\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa9 kapitole jsme sezn\xc3\xa1meni se\xc2\xa0z\xc3\xa1klady jazyka C, obecnou strukturou programu, datov\xc3\xbdmi typy, podm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbdm p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkazem a\xc2\xa0z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadmi oper\xc3\xa1tory.\r\n\r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad podm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xa9ho p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkazu a\xc2\xa0pole pro\xc2\xa0dek\xc3\xb3dov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad stav\xc5\xaf p\xc5\x99ed zobrazen\xc3\xadm.\r\n\r\nSedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola se\xc2\xa0zab\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 funkcemi, jejich z\xc3\xa1pisem a\xc2\xa0pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm. Pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad je p\xc5\x99edvedeno na\xc2\xa0ovl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku M7SEGBUF (7segmentovka s\xc2\xa0budi\xc4\x8dem).\r\n\r\nN\xc3\xa1sleduje osm\xc3\xa1 kapitola, kter\xc3\xa1 popisuje konfiguraci hodinov\xc3\xbdch zdroj\xc5\xaf. Dozv\xc3\xadme se, \xc5\xbee\xc2\xa0mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry mohou krom\xc4\x9b klasick\xc3\xa9ho krystalu pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvat rozli\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9 zdroje taktovac\xc3\xadch impulz\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nKapitola 9 popisuje jednotku Timer0. Jako praktick\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad jsou uvedeny: blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8dem a\xc2\xa0b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad sv\xc4\x9btlo.\r\n\r\nKapitola 10 popisuje pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1ovac\xc3\xadho syst\xc3\xa9mu (p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad je velmi d\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xa9 pro\xc2\xa0obsluhu zabudovan\xc3\xbdch periferi\xc3\xad, hlavn\xc4\x9b \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf). Je vysv\xc4\x9btlen zp\xc5\xafsob obsluhy p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad v\xc2\xa0jazyce C na\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu blik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad LED p\xc5\x99es p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad - na\xc2\xa0pozad\xc3\xad b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadho programu.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0kapitole 11 se\xc2\xa0sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xadme s\xc2\xa0\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xadm displeje s\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xbdm multiplexem, p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MDYNDSP (pochopiteln\xc4\x9b p\xc5\x99es obsluhu p\xc5\x99eru\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de).\r\n\r\nN\xc3\xa1sleduje kapitola 12, kter\xc3\xa1 ukazuje pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku. Pomoc\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MADTEST lze nastavit vstupn\xc3\xad nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0v\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu uk\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbeeme jeho p\xc5\x99evod na\xc2\xa0\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslo a\xc2\xa0n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc3\xa9 zobrazen\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nKapitola 13 seznamuje s\xc2\xa0pokro\xc4\x8dil\xc3\xbdmi \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddic\xc3\xadmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkazy jako jsou cykly a\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99ep\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8d, d\xc3\xa1le je uk\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1no pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad struktury a\xc2\xa0sjednocen\xc3\xad nap\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad pro\xc2\xa0snaz\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstup k\xc2\xa0jednotliv\xc3\xbdm bit\xc5\xafm \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddic\xc3\xadch registr\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0kapitole 14 je uveden popis jednotek Timer1 a\xc5\xbe\xc2\xa0Timer3, tedy dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtac\xc3\xadch/\xc4\x8dasovac\xc3\xadch jednotek.\r\n\r\nKapitola 15 p\xc5\x99edv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad 4bitovou komunikaci s\xc2\xa0\xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dkov\xc3\xbdm LCD na\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MLCD. Jsou vytvo\xc5\x99eny funkce pro\xc2\xa0\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad LCD a\xc2\xa0je p\xc5\x99edvedeno jejich pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad. N\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b je pops\xc3\xa1na funkce printf, kter\xc3\xa1 dok\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbee usnadnit v\xc3\xbdpisy \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadseln\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbadaj\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0je p\xc5\x99edvedeno jej\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99esm\xc4\x9brov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0displej. Pro\xc2\xa0v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad univerz\xc3\xa1lnost jsou ovl\xc3\xa1dac\xc3\xad funkce um\xc3\xadst\xc4\x9bny do\xc2\xa0zvl\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1tn\xc3\xad jednotky nazvan\xc3\xa9 MLCD.\r\n\r\nN\xc3\xa1sleduje kapitola 16, kter\xc3\xa1 vysv\xc4\x9btluje praktick\xc3\xa9 aspekty m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu, periody a\xc2\xa0st\xc5\x99\xc3\xaddy. Tyto informace jsou pak zu\xc5\xbeitkov\xc3\xa1ny p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MRX555 \xe2\x80\x93 astabiln\xc3\xadho klopn\xc3\xa9ho obvodu s\xc2\xa0NE555. Tento obvod dovoluje p\xc5\x99ev\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bt kapacitu nebo odpor na\xc2\xa0kmito\xc4\x8det resp. \xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xbd interval. Uveden\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad pak ukazuje m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu. D\xc3\xa1le je pops\xc3\xa1n p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravek MXTALCCP, kter\xc3\xbd umo\xc5\xben\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99edv\xc3\xa9st realizaci zdroje re\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xa9ho \xc4\x8dasu pomoc\xc3\xad hodinkov\xc3\xa9ho krystalu a\xc2\xa0jednotky Timer1.\r\n\r\nKapitola 17 popisuje jednotku CCP \xe2\x80\x93 Capture/Compare/PWM a\xc2\xa0jej\xc3\xad pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad u\xc2\xa0mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru PIC18F452. Prakticky je p\xc5\x99edveden p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad odm\xc4\x9br trv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad log. 0 pomoc\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1chytn\xc3\xa9ho registru, generov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad periodick\xc3\xa9ho sign\xc3\xa1lu pomoc\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadho kompar\xc3\xa1toru, realizace monostabiln\xc3\xadho klopn\xc3\xa9ho obvodu a\xc2\xa0zm\xc4\x9bna st\xc5\x99\xc3\xaddy pomoc\xc3\xad PWM.\r\n\r\nKapitola 18 je zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ena na\xc2\xa0popis jednotky ECCP (vylep\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xa9 CCP jednotky) a\xc2\xa0jej\xc3\xad pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad u\xc2\xa0mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru PIC18F1220. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravek MBRIDGE dovoluje vyu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadt 4 kan\xc3\xa1lov\xc3\xbd PWM re\xc5\xbeim pro\xc2\xa0m\xc5\xafstkov\xc3\xa9 \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad ot\xc3\xa1\xc4\x8dek stejnosm\xc4\x9brn\xc3\xa9ho motoru ob\xc4\x9bma sm\xc4\x9bry.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0kapitol\xc3\xa1ch 19 a\xc2\xa020 se\xc2\xa0sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xadme s\xc2\xa0re\xc5\xbeimy SPI a\xc2\xa0I2C jednotky MSSP mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru PIC18F452. Pomoc\xc3\xad SPI sb\xc4\x9brnice je \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbd D/A\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk MCP4921 v\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku nazvan\xc3\xa9m MSPIDAC. Pomoc\xc3\xad sb\xc4\x9brnice I2C je \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbd D/A\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk TC1320 (v\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MTC1320) a\xc2\xa0d\xc3\xa1le expand\xc3\xa9r MCP23016 (v\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MI2CEXP).\r\n\r\nKapitola 21 popisuje jednotku USART mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru PIC18F452. V\xc2\xa0asynchronn\xc3\xadm re\xc5\xbeimu je pak uk\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1no ovl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MLCDGEN, co\xc5\xbe je LCD vybaven\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99ij\xc3\xadma\xc4\x8dem s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xa9 linky. Tak se\xc2\xa0tedy ukazuje vys\xc3\xadl\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad pomoc\xc3\xad s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xa9ho portu. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravek MLCDGEN je uveden ve\xc2\xa0dvou cenov\xc3\xbdch variant\xc3\xa1ch, kter\xc3\xa9 se\xc2\xa0li\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad po\xc4\x8dtem znak\xc5\xaf zobraziteln\xc3\xbdch v\xc2\xa0jednom \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dku (dra\xc5\xbe\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad varianta 2 \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dky po\xc2\xa016 znac\xc3\xadch a\xc2\xa0levn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad varianta se\xc2\xa02 \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dky po\xc2\xa08 znac\xc3\xadch). Pro\xc2\xa0zjednodu\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xadch operac\xc3\xad je op\xc4\x9bt pou\xc5\xbeita funkce printf.\r\n\r\nKapitola 22 popisuje jednotku EUSART mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru PIC18F1220. Prvn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad ukazuje m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad kmito\xc4\x8dtu z\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku MRX555 a\xc2\xa0zobrazen\xc3\xad na\xc2\xa0MLCDGEN (op\xc4\x9bt komunikujeme s\xc3\xa9riovou asynchronn\xc4\x9b \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzenou linkou). Druh\xc3\xbd p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad ukazuje p\xc5\x99estaven\xc3\xad jednotky EUSART do\xc2\xa0synchronn\xc3\xadho re\xc5\xbeimu pro\xc2\xa0emulaci sb\xc4\x9brnice SPI, prakticky je uk\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xa1na komunikace se\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbdm D/A\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadkem MCP4921.\r\nN\xc3\xa1sleduje kapitola 23, kter\xc3\xa1 popisuje jednotku LVD \xe2\x80\x93 detektor podp\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nKapitoly 24 a\xc2\xa025 jsou v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny zvl\xc3\xa1\xc5\xa1tn\xc3\xadm rys\xc5\xafm obou typ\xc5\xaf mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se\xc2\xa0o\xc2\xa0popis konfigura\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch registr\xc5\xaf (umo\xc5\xben\xc3\xad \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddit volbu hodinov\xc3\xa9ho zdroje, WDT a\xc2\xa0podobn\xc4\x9b). N\xc3\xa1sleduje popis jednotky WDT (Watchdog) a\xc2\xa0re\xc5\xbeim\xc5\xaf pro\xc2\xa0\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad spot\xc5\x99eby. Rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny jednotky dvourychlostn\xc3\xadho start-upu a\xc2\xa0monitoru v\xc3\xbdpadku hodin, kter\xc3\xbdmi disponuje mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r PIC18F1220.\r\n\r\nV\xc2\xa0kapitole 26 jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny jednotliv\xc3\xa9 zdroje resetu, jako jsou: reset p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xad nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xadho nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad, \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8d n\xc3\xa1b\xc4\x9bhu nap\xc3\xa1jec\xc3\xadho nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad, startovac\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8d oscil\xc3\xa1toru, reset p\xc5\x99i\xc2\xa0podp\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nKapitoly 27 a\xc2\xa028 seznamuj\xc3\xad s\xc2\xa0organizac\xc3\xad pam\xc4\x9bti a\xc2\xa0pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad datov\xc3\xa9 EEPROM.\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloha A\xc2\xa0vysv\xc4\x9btluje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad pojmy \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9 a\xc2\xa0mikroprocesorov\xc3\xa9 techniky za\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1te\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadk\xc5\xafm. V\xc4\x9bnuje se\xc2\xa0tedy v\xc3\xbdkladu logick\xc3\xbdch hradel, z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch sekven\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch obvod\xc5\xaf, pam\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xa9ho p\xc5\x99enosu.\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - Krom\xc4\x9b popisu kl\xc3\xad\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stek nechyb\xc3\xad ani dopln\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 umo\xc5\xben\xc3\xad l\xc3\xa9pe pochopit jejich princip a tak\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady praktick\xc3\xa9ho pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad dv\xc4\x9b kapitoly jsou v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1ny fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadm z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xafm polovodi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf. Prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad se p\xc3\xa1sov\xc3\xa9 diagramy, vlastn\xc3\xad a nevlastn\xc3\xad polovodi\xc4\x8de, veden\xc3\xad proudu v polovodi\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadch, injekce, generace a rekombinace nosi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf n\xc3\xa1boje.\r\n\r\nKapitoly 3 a 4 prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad PN p\xc5\x99echod, kter\xc3\xbd je z\xc3\xa1kladem v\xc5\xa1ech polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stek. Jsou diskutov\xc3\xa1ny pojmy: dif\xc3\xbazn\xc3\xad nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad, Shockleyho rovnice, bari\xc3\xa9rov\xc3\xa1 a dif\xc3\xbazn\xc3\xad kapacita a praktick\xc3\xa1 proveden\xc3\xad diod. D\xc3\xa1le jsou vysv\xc4\x9btleny diody PIN, stabiliza\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad diody, tunelov\xc3\xa1 dioda, p\xc5\x99echod kov - polovodi\xc4\x8d (Schottkyho dioda) a pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad diod pro sp\xc3\xadnac\xc3\xad aplikace.\r\nKapitoly 5 a\xc5\xbe 7 prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad tranzistory. Nejd\xc5\x99\xc3\xadve se prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad bipol\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad tranzistory (NPN a PNP), n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b tranzistory \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 elektrick\xc3\xbdm polem (JFET a MOSFET). Krom\xc4\x9b fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch princip\xc5\xaf jsou uvedeny jejich charakteristiky, modely, obvody pro nastaven\xc3\xad a stabilizaci pracovn\xc3\xadho bodu, zesilovac\xc3\xad stupn\xc4\x9b, sp\xc3\xadnac\xc3\xad aplikace a technologie v\xc3\xbdroby s ohledem na c\xc3\xadlov\xc3\xa9 parametry. T\xc3\xa9\xc5\xbe je diskutov\xc3\xa1na ot\xc3\xa1zka chlazen\xc3\xad, prvn\xc3\xad a druh\xc3\xbd pr\xc5\xafraz a p\xc5\x99ep\xc3\xadnac\xc3\xad ztr\xc3\xa1ty.\r\n\r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad ostatn\xc3\xad sp\xc3\xadnac\xc3\xad sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stky: diak, tyristor, GTO tyristor, IGCT, MCT, triak, transil, trisil a IGBT.\r\n\r\nDev\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na opera\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadm zesilova\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm. Jsou uvedeny a vysv\xc4\x9btleny z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti (zes\xc3\xadlen\xc3\xad otev\xc5\x99en\xc3\xa9 smy\xc4\x8dky, vstupn\xc3\xad a v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xad odpor, \xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99ka p\xc3\xa1sma, rychlost p\xc5\x99eb\xc4\x9bhu, vstupn\xc3\xad ofsety). Je diskutov\xc3\xa1na zp\xc4\x9btn\xc3\xa1 vazba a pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1porn\xc3\xa9 zp\xc4\x9btn\xc3\xa9 vazby je dokumentov\xc3\xa1no na p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkladu invertuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadho a neinvertuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadho zesilova\xc4\x8de.\r\n\r\nDes\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola je zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ena na sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stky \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 neelektrick\xc3\xbdmi veli\xc4\x8dinami. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se o optoelektronick\xc3\xa9 sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stky (LED, laserov\xc3\xa1 dioda, fotorezistor, fotodioda, fototranzistor, optrony, zobrazovac\xc3\xad prvky), termistory a sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stky \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xa9 magnetick\xc3\xbdm polem.\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-404-0', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nAnal\xc3\xbdza elektrick\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf je nezbytn\xc3\xa1 nejen pro v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8det obvodov\xc3\xbdch veli\xc4\x8din, ale dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad jej\xc3\xad funkc\xc3\xad je tak\xc3\xa9 porozum\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad jejich princip\xc5\xafm.\r\n\r\nAnal\xc3\xbdza po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdm programem p\xc5\x99itom nepochybn\xc4\x9b p\xc5\x99edstavuje nejv\xc3\xbdkonn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1stroj a to i pro synt\xc3\xa9zu obvod\xc5\xaf a jejich optimalizaci, av\xc5\xa1ak pro vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad jasn\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99edstavy je pak nezbytn\xc3\xa9 \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad ru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad, nebo\xc5\xa5 plat\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1sada: co neprojde smysly, to nen\xc3\xad v mysli. P\xc5\x99itom v\xc5\xa1ak maticov\xc3\xbd po\xc4\x8det je s\xc3\xa1m o sob\xc4\x9b zna\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b abstraktn\xc3\xad, av\xc5\xa1ak grafov\xc3\xa9 metody anal\xc3\xbdzy umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1zorn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad vytvo\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99edstavy o obvodu. Ov\xc5\xa1em co se t\xc3\xbd\xc4\x8de v\xc3\xbdkonnosti pak anal\xc3\xbdze po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8dem nemohou konkurovat v \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xa9m p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpad\xc4\x9b.\r\n\r\nPro \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad obvod\xc5\xaf se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi obvody, a\xc5\xa5 sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi kapacitory anebo sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi proudy existuje \xc5\x99ada r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xbdch metod, z nich\xc5\xbe mnoh\xc3\xa9 jsou zalo\xc5\xbeeny na popisu obvodu rovnicemi v maticov\xc3\xa9m tvaru. V knize jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny dv\xc4\x9b metody, vyu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvaj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad pro \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad obvod\xc5\xaf se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi kapacitory a proudy na rozd\xc3\xadl od dosud v literatu\xc5\x99e uv\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbdch \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad v\xc3\xbdlu\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b grafov\xc3\xbdch konstrukc\xc3\xad, zalo\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xbdch na tzv. transforma\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch grafech a na dvojgrafech, a to jedna pro \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad metodou uzlov\xc3\xbdch n\xc3\xa1bojov\xc3\xbdch rovnic a druh\xc3\xa1 metodou uzlov\xc3\xbdch nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\n\r\nTato monografie vznikla p\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm pro podporu v\xc3\xbduky na\xc2\xa0Vysok\xc3\xa9 \xc5\xa1kole polytechnick\xc3\xa9 v Jihlav\xc4\x9b. Vych\xc3\xa1z\xc3\xad v mal\xc3\xa9m n\xc3\xa1kladu.\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-404-0\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-409-5 (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\tTransforma\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad grafy v metod\xc4\x9b uzlov\xc3\xbdch n\xc3\xa1bojov\xc3\xbdch rovnic pro \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad obvod\xc5\xaf se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi kapacitory\r\n\tDvojgrafy v metod\xc4\x9b uzlov\xc3\xbdch n\xc3\xa1bojov\xc3\xbdch rovnic pro \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad obvod\xc5\xaf se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi kapacitory\r\n\tTransforma\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad grafy v obvodech se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi proudy\r\n\tDvojgrafy v obvodech se sp\xc3\xadnan\xc3\xbdmi proudy\r\n\tVarianta vyhodnocen\xc3\xad grafu o dvou uzlech\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-403-3', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nText je koncipov\xc3\xa1na tak, aby \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 mohl postupn\xc4\x9b vlastn\xc3\xadmi silami pochopit programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad v jazyce C a poznal z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad \xc3\xbalohy z oblasti programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a algoritmizace. V\xc3\xbdklad je dopln\xc4\x9bn celkem 35 \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xbdmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady. \r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola p\xc5\x99edstavuje \xc3\xbavod do programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad. Jsou vysv\xc4\x9btleny pojmy jako algoritmus, v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xbd diagram a rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad datov\xc3\xa9 typy jazyka C. \r\nVe druh\xc3\xa9 kapitole se sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xadme se z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadmi funkcemi a oper\xc3\xa1tory. P\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm je vysv\xc4\x9btlena funkce printf (v\xc3\xbdpis na obrazovku), aritmetick\xc3\xa9 oper\xc3\xa1tory a matematick\xc3\xa9 funkce. \r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje podm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkazy if a switch. D\xc3\xa1le jsou vysv\xc4\x9btleny rela\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad a logick\xc3\xa9 oper\xc3\xa1tory. \r\nVe \xc4\x8dtvrt\xc3\xa9 kapitole se prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad cykly (itera\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadkazy) a d\xc3\xa1le je vysv\xc4\x9btleno pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad datov\xc3\xa9ho typu pole. \r\nP\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad ukazatel\xc5\xaf, dynamickou alokaci pam\xc4\x9bti, ukazatelovou aritmetiku a funkci scanf (na\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadt\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad z kl\xc3\xa1vesnice). \r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 a sedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 funkce. Vysv\xc4\x9btluje se rozd\xc3\xadl mezi vol\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xadm parametr\xc5\xaf hodnotou a p\xc5\x99es ukazatele, prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 se ukazatel na funkci a rekurze. D\xc3\xa1le je prob\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1na implementace \xc5\x99et\xc4\x9bzce v jazyce C v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b pomocn\xc3\xbdch funkc\xc3\xad z hlavi\xc4\x8dkov\xc3\xa9ho souboru string.h. \r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola dopl\xc5\x88uje informace k datov\xc3\xbdm typ\xc5\xafm. Nejd\xc5\x99\xc3\xadve se prob\xc3\xadraj\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad algoritmy \xc5\x99azen\xc3\xad pole (Selectsort, Bubblesort, Insertsort), vysv\xc4\x9btluje se pr\xc3\xa1ce se spojov\xc3\xbdmi seznamy a modul\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-401-9', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nSOTA je novou formou turistiky, kter\xc3\xa1 k n\xc3\xa1m p\xc5\x99i\xc5\xa1la z Anglie a rychle se \xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99\xc3\xad po cel\xc3\xa9m sv\xc4\x9bt\xc4\x9b. Je to prvn\xc3\xad kn\xc3\xad\xc5\xbeka, kter\xc3\xa1 o tom pojedn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1. \r\n\r\nKniha pojedn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 o radioamat\xc3\xa9rsk\xc3\xa9m programu Summits on the Air (zkr\xc3\xa1cen\xc4\x9b SOTA) - Vrcholy v \xc3\xa9teru. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se o p\xc5\x99ita\xc5\xbelivou kombinaci turistiky a radioamat\xc3\xa9rsk\xc3\xa9ho vys\xc3\xadl\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad. Aktiv\xc3\xa1to\xc5\x99i (activators) vystoupaj\xc3\xad na vrcholy kopc\xc5\xaf a vys\xc3\xadlaj\xc3\xad pro Lovce (chasers) k\xc3\xb3dy kopc\xc5\xaf. Lze tak z\xc3\xadskat diplomy i v\xc4\x9bcn\xc3\xa9 trofeje. Ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xbd se v\xc5\xa1ak sna\xc5\xbe\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm zlep\xc5\xa1it s\xc3\xa1m sebe. \r\n\r\nSeri\xc3\xa1l \xc4\x8dl\xc3\xa1nk\xc5\xaf o programu SOTA vych\xc3\xa1zel v \xc4\x8dasopisu Praktick\xc3\xa1 elektronika A Radio. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-400-2', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nPojedn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 o \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch gener\xc3\xa1torech a \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtrech od jejich teoretick\xc3\xbdch princip\xc5\xaf p\xc5\x99es n\xc3\xa1vrh a\xc5\xbe po praktickou realizaci. \r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola je \xc3\xbavodem do \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9ho zpracov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l\xc5\xaf. \r\nDruh\xc3\xa1 kapitola je zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ena na teoretick\xc3\xa9 aspekty realizace \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc4\x9b \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xbdch gener\xc3\xa1tor\xc5\xaf. \r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola se v\xc4\x9bnuje stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9mu popisu mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru ATmega644, kter\xc3\xbd je pou\xc5\xbeit p\xc5\x99i implementaci jednotliv\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbaloh. \r\n\xc4\x8ctvrt\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje konstrukci v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9ho kitu COM644KIT, kter\xc3\xbd umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uje soub\xc4\x9b\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru ATmega644 a v\xc3\xbdvoj aplikac\xc3\xad. \r\nP\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola popisuje konstrukci p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku EDAC, co\xc5\xbe je modul obsahuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad levn\xc3\xbd 2kan\xc3\xa1lov\xc3\xbd D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk typu TLC7528CN s rozli\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xadm 8 bit\xc5\xaf. \r\n\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 kapitola p\xc5\x99edv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad praktickou realizaci jednoduch\xc3\xa9ho gener\xc3\xa1toru sign\xc3\xa1lu. Nejd\xc5\x99\xc3\xadve jsou vysv\xc4\x9btleny pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xa9 instrukce a n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b je p\xc5\x99edvedena tvorba programu. \r\nSedm\xc3\xa1 kapitola se v\xc4\x9bnuje popisu p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku PANEL, co\xc5\xbe je modul s \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddic\xc3\xad jednotkou a LCD. Tento modul je d\xc3\xa1le pou\xc5\xbeit pro p\xc5\x99ela\xc4\x8fov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad gener\xc3\xa1toru. \r\nOsm\xc3\xa1 kapitola ukazuje realizaci laditeln\xc3\xa9ho gener\xc3\xa1toru sign\xc3\xa1lu pracuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadho na principu decimace vzork\xc5\xaf. \r\nV dev\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa9 kapitole jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny principy \xc4\x8dinnosti, funkce a z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vlastnosti \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf typu FIR a IIR pro doln\xc3\xad i horn\xc3\xad propust. \r\nDes\xc3\xa1t\xc3\xa1 kapitola obsahuje \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady n\xc3\xa1vrhu \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadmi metodami s podrobn\xc3\xbdm koment\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99em postupu n\xc3\xa1vrhu filtru FIR metodou okna a filtru IIR metodou analogov\xc3\xa9ho prototypu s vyu\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm biline\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad transformace a impulsn\xc3\xad invariance. Je zm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn vliv odchylek kmito\xc4\x8dtov\xc3\xbdch charakteristik d\xc5\xafsledkem kone\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xa9ho po\xc4\x8dtu cifer, co\xc5\xbe si vynucuje tuto charakteristiku u realizovan\xc3\xa9ho filtru ov\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99it m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xadm. \r\nJeden\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola uv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad konstrukci p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravku EADC, co\xc5\xbe je p\xc5\x99izp\xc5\xafsobovac\xc3\xad modul pro p\xc5\x99ipojen\xc3\xad vstupn\xc3\xadho sign\xc3\xa1lu na vstupy A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadku zabudovan\xc3\xa9ho do mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru ATmega644. Proveden\xc3\xad je dvoukan\xc3\xa1lov\xc3\xa9. \r\nDvan\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola vysv\xc4\x9btluje realizaci vzorkov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad pomoc\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dasova\xc4\x8de 0 a prakticky ji p\xc5\x99edv\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xad na tzv. transparentn\xc3\xadm re\xc5\xbeimu, kdy je vstupn\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l p\xc5\x99eveden A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadkem na \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslo a n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b D/A p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadkem p\xc5\x99eveden zp\xc4\x9bt na v\xc3\xbdstupn\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l. Vzorkov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad je prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bno kmito\xc4\x8dtem 3,5 kHz. \r\nT\xc5\x99in\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa1 kapitola shrnuje p\xc5\x99edchoz\xc3\xad teoretick\xc3\xa9 a praktick\xc3\xa9 poznatky do realizace t\xc5\x99\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch filtr\xc5\xaf typu doln\xc3\xad propust. Jedn\xc3\xa1 se o pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad metody impulsn\xc3\xad invariance, metody analogov\xc3\xa9ho prototypu s biline\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xad transformac\xc3\xad a realizaci FIR filtru. \r\nVe \xc4\x8dtrn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa9 kapitole je stru\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b pops\xc3\xa1n princip v\xc3\xbdpo\xc4\x8dtu kmito\xc4\x8dtov\xc3\xa9 charakteristiky \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9ho filtru p\xc5\x99i jeho simulaci po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8dem a v patn\xc3\xa1ct\xc3\xa9 kapitole je uveden konkr\xc3\xa9tn\xc3\xad postup p\xc5\x99i simulaci filtru FIR programem MicroCap 10.  \r\nSch\xc3\xa9ma zapojen\xc3\xad pro m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad a postup p\xc5\x99i zpracov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad nam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xbdch hodnot u\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm programu Microsoft Excel jsou pops\xc3\xa1ny v kapitole posledn\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\nTato monografie vznikla p\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm pro podporu v\xc3\xbduky oboru Po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xa9 syst\xc3\xa9my na\xc2\xa0Vysok\xc3\xa9 \xc5\xa1kole polytechnick\xc3\xa9 v Jihlav\xc4\x9b. Je ur\xc4\x8dena rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe v\xc5\xa1em z\xc3\xa1jemc\xc5\xafm o \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9 zpracov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l\xc5\xaf z \xc5\x99ad odborn\xc3\xa9 ve\xc5\x99ejnosti. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-265-7', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nAnotace v angli\xc4\x8dtin\xc4\x9b\r\nElectrical power system contains generation plants, transmission networks, distribution networks, and appliances. Electrical substations are basic connecting elements between generation plants, transmission and distribution networks and within the distribution network between the power system and appliances. Principal task of electrical substations is to transform the voltage, distribute electrical energy of all voltage levels and in specific cases also to transform AC voltage to DC voltage and vice versa. Important function of electrical substations in the electrical system is data collection and data transfer, implementation of network configuration and prompt solution of failures.\r\n\r\nTransmission system voltage levels are 400 and 220 kV. The 400 kV voltage system is interconnected with the UCTE European network. Distribution system is supplied from the 400 (220)/110 kV central distributing substations of the transmission system and partially from the sources with lower power output. Its fundamental HV voltage is 110 kV and it continues through the MV levels with their sizes depending on the area (35 kV in Eastern Bohemia, 22 kV in the largest part of the Czech power system) and on the extent of consumption. Smaller municipalities in the 35 kV network regions are supplied on the level of 10 kV, while those in the 22 kV network regions are powered on the level of 6 kV. Low voltage is predominantly 400 V, other voltage levels presented in the table are used exceptionally. Distribution system has mostly the character of a rural or city distribution system. Industrial plants and electrical traction are also supplied from the public distribution power system.\r\n\r\nAnotace v \xc4\x8de\xc5\xa1tin\xc4\x9b\r\n\r\nElektriza\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad soustava sest\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1 z v\xc3\xbdroben, p\xc5\x99enosu, rozvodu a spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf elektrick\xc3\xa9 energie. Z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadm spojovac\xc3\xadm prvkem mezi v\xc3\xbdrobnami, p\xc5\x99enosovou a  rozvodnou s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad a ve vlastn\xc3\xad rozvodn\xc3\xa9 s\xc3\xadti mezi s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad a spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8di, jsou elektrick\xc3\xa9 stanice, jejich\xc5\xbe hlavn\xc3\xadm \xc3\xbakolem je transformovat nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad, rozd\xc4\x9blovat dod\xc3\xa1vku elektrick\xc3\xa9 energie v\xc5\xa1ech nap\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xbdch \xc3\xbarovn\xc3\xad a ve specifick\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpadech prov\xc3\xa1d\xc4\x9bt p\xc5\x99em\xc4\x9bnu st\xc5\x99\xc3\xaddav\xc3\xa9ho nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad na stejnosm\xc4\x9brn\xc3\xa9 a naopak. D\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeitou funkc\xc3\xad elektrick\xc3\xbdch stanic v elektriza\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad soustav\xc4\x9b je sb\xc4\x9br a p\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad dat, realizace konfigurace s\xc3\xadt\xc4\x9b a rychl\xc3\xa9 \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad poruchov\xc3\xbdch stav\xc5\xaf.\r\nNap\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xa9 \xc3\xbarovn\xc4\x9b p\xc5\x99enosov\xc3\xa9 soustavy jsou 400 a 220 kV. Nap\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5ov\xc3\xa1 soustava 400 kV  je  propojena s evropskou s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad UCTE. Distribu\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad (rozvodn\xc3\xa1) soustava je nap\xc3\xa1jena z uzlov\xc3\xbdch stanic 400 (220)/110 kV z p\xc5\x99enosov\xc3\xa9 soustavy a \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1ste\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b ze zdroj\xc5\xaf men\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch v\xc3\xbdkon\xc5\xaf. Jej\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad vvn  nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad je 110 kV a d\xc3\xa1le pokra\xc4\x8duje p\xc5\x99es \xc3\xbarovn\xc4\x9b vn, jejich\xc5\xbe velikost je d\xc3\xa1na jednak \xc3\xbazem\xc3\xadm ( ve v\xc3\xbdchodn\xc3\xadch \xc4\x8cech\xc3\xa1ch p\xc5\x99eva\xc5\xbeuje 35 kV, rozs\xc3\xa1hlej\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st \xc4\x8desk\xc3\xa9 soustavy pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1 22 kV), jednak rozsahem odb\xc4\x9bru. Men\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad obce v regionech s 35 kV s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad jsou nap\xc3\xa1jeny na \xc3\xbarovni 10 kV, v regionech s 22 kV s\xc3\xadt\xc3\xad na \xc3\xbarovni 6 kV. N\xc3\xadzk\xc3\xa9 nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad je p\xc5\x99ev\xc3\xa1\xc5\xben\xc4\x9b 400 V, ostatn\xc3\xad nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad uveden\xc3\xa1 v tabulce jsou vzu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1na vyj\xc3\xadme\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b. Distribu\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad soustava m\xc3\xa1 p\xc5\x99ev\xc3\xa1\xc5\xben\xc4\x9b charakter venkovsk\xc3\xa9ho nebo m\xc4\x9bstsk\xc3\xa9ho rozvodu. Z ve\xc5\x99ejn\xc3\xa9 distribu\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad soustavy jsou tak\xc3\xa9 nap\xc3\xa1jeny pr\xc5\xafmyslov\xc3\xa9 z\xc3\xa1vody a elektrick\xc3\xa1 trakce.\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - b\xc5\x99ezen 2011 - 978-80-7300-265-7\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - p\xc5\x99ipravujeme (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu Sp\xc3\xad\xc5\xa1e, ne\xc5\xbe popisu jazyka VHDL pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadvan\xc3\xa9ho b\xc4\x9b\xc5\xben\xc4\x9b pro n\xc3\xa1vrh a teorii implementace logick\xc3\xa9 funkce, se zab\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 skute\xc4\x8dnou obvodovou realizac\xc3\xad, spr\xc3\xa1vn\xc3\xbdm pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm n\xc3\xa1vrhov\xc3\xa9ho software, upozor\xc5\x88uje na mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 pasti a potenci\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad probl\xc3\xa9my, se kter\xc3\xbdmi se p\xc5\x99i n\xc3\xa1vrhu obvod\xc5\xaf pot\xc3\xbdkaj\xc3\xad za\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1te\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadci i pokro\xc4\x8dilej\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1vrh\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99i a d\xc3\xa1le rozeb\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 v \xc4\x8desk\xc3\xa9 literatu\xc5\x99e jen velmi okrajov\xc4\x9b diskutovan\xc3\xa1 t\xc3\xa9mata, jejich\xc5\xbe znalost je v\xc5\xa1ak kl\xc3\xad\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xa1 pro spr\xc3\xa1vn\xc3\xbd n\xc3\xa1vrh \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9ho syst\xc3\xa9mu. K jednotliv\xc3\xbdm koncept\xc5\xafm a informac\xc3\xadm jsou k dispozici uk\xc3\xa1zkov\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady n\xc3\xa1vrhu obvod\xc5\xaf a cvi\xc4\x8den\xc3\xad umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad sna\xc5\xbe\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad pochopen\xc3\xad. V\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1ina prezentovan\xc3\xbdch informac\xc3\xad a postup\xc5\xaf je aplikovateln\xc3\xa1 i p\xc5\x99i n\xc3\xa1vrhu z\xc3\xa1kaznick\xc3\xbdch integrovan\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf. Kniha pokr\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 n\xc3\xa1sleduj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad t\xc3\xa9mata:\r\n\r\n\tPrvn\xc3\xad celek se zab\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadmi postupy p\xc5\x99i n\xc3\xa1vrhu obvod\xc5\xaf, zmi\xc5\x88uje modern\xc3\xad programov\xc3\xa9 vybaven\xc3\xad a detailn\xc4\x9b rozeb\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 jednotliv\xc3\xa9 kroky p\xc5\x99i jeho pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad.\r\n\tDal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st knihy popisuje programovateln\xc3\xa1 hradlov\xc3\xa1 pole, jejich architektury, vlastnosti a shrnuje kriteria pro v\xc3\xbdb\xc4\x9br vhodn\xc3\xa9ho obvodu pro konkr\xc3\xa9tn\xc3\xad aplikaci.\r\n\tT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st kr\xc3\xa1ce shrnuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad konstrukce jazyka VHDL pou\xc5\xbeiteln\xc3\xa9 pro n\xc3\xa1vrh \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf.\r\n\t\xc4\x8ctvr\xc3\xbd celek je zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xbd na syst\xc3\xa9mov\xc3\xbd n\xc3\xa1vrh obvodu, p\xc5\x99edkl\xc3\xa1d\xc3\xa1 z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad pravidla pro implementaci v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch logick\xc3\xbdch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf a shrnuje a vysv\xc4\x9btluje dobr\xc3\xa9 n\xc3\xa1vrhov\xc3\xa9 praktiky.\r\n\tDal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad kapitola kapitola &quot;Aritmetick\xc3\xa9 oper\xc3\xa1tory a slo\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad funkce&quot; a na ni navazuj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad celky &quot;Datov\xc3\xa9 cesty&quot; a &quot;Obvody pro \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xa9 zpracov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1l\xc5\xaf&quot; p\xc5\x99edkl\xc3\xa1daj\xc3\xad mo\xc5\xbenosti implementace obecn\xc3\xbdch funkc\xc3\xad a jak z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xadch, tak speci\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch aritmetick\xc3\xbdch operac\xc3\xad.\r\n\t\xc5\xa0est\xc3\xa1 kapitola &quot;Stavov\xc3\xa9 automaty&quot; je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na m\xc3\xa9n\xc4\x9b zn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xbdm aspekt\xc5\xafm n\xc3\xa1vrhu logick\xc3\xbdch struktur pro implementaci stavov\xc3\xbdch automat\xc5\xaf.\r\n\tSedm\xc3\xbd celek &quot;Pam\xc4\x9bti&quot; shrnuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad techniky a mo\xc5\xbenosti implementace zm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbdch struktur na programovateln\xc3\xbdch hradlov\xc3\xbdch pol\xc3\xadch. \r\n\tP\xc5\x99edposledn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st &quot;Hodiny, reset a asynchronn\xc3\xad sign\xc3\xa1ly&quot; detailn\xc4\x9b rozeb\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1 spr\xc3\xa1vnou pr\xc3\xa1ci s hodinov\xc3\xbdmi sign\xc3\xa1ly, implementaci asynchronn\xc3\xadho resetovac\xc3\xadho sign\xc3\xa1lu a \xc4\x8dasto opom\xc3\xadjenou nicm\xc3\xa9n\xc4\x9b pro praxi velmi d\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeitou problematiku pr\xc3\xa1ce s asynchronn\xc3\xadmi sign\xc3\xa1ly.\r\n\tKone\xc4\x8dn\xc4\x9b osm\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st shrnuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad rozd\xc3\xadly mezi n\xc3\xa1vrhem FPGA obvod\xc5\xaf a z\xc3\xa1kaznick\xc3\xbdch integrovan\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf spolu s n\xc3\xa1m\xc4\x9bty pro dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad studium.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nPublikace je ur\xc4\x8dena jak pro studenty st\xc5\x99edn\xc3\xadch odborn\xc3\xbdch a vysok\xc3\xbdch \xc5\xa1kol, tak i pro pedagogy a odborn\xc3\xadky z praxe. Sv\xc3\xbdm zam\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xadm a pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xbdmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady n\xc3\xa1vrh\xc5\xaf je vhodn\xc3\xa1 i pro dom\xc3\xa1c\xc3\xad kutily a bastl\xc3\xad\xc5\x99e, kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad by r\xc3\xa1di ve sv\xc3\xbdch konstrukc\xc3\xadch pou\xc5\xbeili programovateln\xc3\xa1 hradlov\xc3\xa1 pole, ale nemaj\xc3\xad dostatek informac\xc3\xad o praktick\xc3\xbdch aspektech a modern\xc3\xadch technik\xc3\xa1ch n\xc3\xa1vrhu \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadslicov\xc3\xbdch obvod\xc5\xaf. \r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - listopad 2011 Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-266-4', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nKniha \r\n&quot;N\xc3\xa1vrh a konstrukce desek plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf&quot;\r\npopisuje z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad aspekty n\xc3\xa1vrhu desek plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf (DPS), tedy problematiku po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xa9ho n\xc3\xa1vrhu DPS, technologii v\xc3\xbdroby v\xc3\xadcevrstv\xc3\xbdch DPS, osazov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a p\xc3\xa1jen\xc3\xad SMD, elektrick\xc3\xa9 vlastnosti plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf. Rozs\xc3\xa1hl\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st knihy je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9 kompatibilit\xc4\x9b (EMC) a s n\xc3\xad souvisej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadmi n\xc3\xa1vrhov\xc3\xbdmi pravidly.\r\n\r\nI kdy\xc5\xbe se p\xc5\x99i n\xc3\xa1vrhu desek plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf velmi efektivn\xc4\x9b vyu\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1 po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf, neznamen\xc3\xa1 to, \xc5\xbee navrhovat DPS na po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8di je pouh\xc3\xa9 klik\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad my\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad. Po\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadta\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xa9 n\xc3\xa1vrhov\xc3\xa9 syst\xc3\xa9my jsou jen \xc3\xba\xc4\x8dinn\xc3\xa9 n\xc3\xa1stroje, usnad\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad pr\xc3\xa1ci n\xc3\xa1vrh\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf. N\xc3\xa1vrh DPS vy\xc5\xbeaduje p\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm (a\xc4\x8d to tak na prvn\xc3\xad pohled nevypad\xc3\xa1) komplexn\xc3\xad znalosti v oblastech:\r\n\r\n\ttechnologie v\xc3\xbdroby desek plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf (DPS),\r\n\tosazov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a p\xc3\xa1jen\xc3\xad,\r\n\tobvodov\xc3\xa9 funkce sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stek,\r\n\tteorie elektromagnetick\xc3\xa9ho pole\r\n\r\n\r\na p\xc5\x99edev\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadm jejich sklouben\xc3\xad a vyu\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xad v praxi. C\xc3\xadlem knihy je upozornit \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99e na nejd\xc5\xafle\xc5\xbeit\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad probl\xc3\xa9my, kter\xc3\xa9 bude muset zdolat p\xc5\x99i n\xc3\xa1vrhu elektronick\xc3\xbdch sch\xc3\xa9mat a desek plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xa9ho spoje. \r\n\r\nN\xc3\xa1vrh\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99em se \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk nestane pouze \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xadm publikac\xc3\xad, ale aktivn\xc3\xad mraven\xc4\x8d\xc3\xad dlouhodobou prac\xc3\xad, sb\xc3\xadr\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xadm zku\xc5\xa1enost\xc3\xad a zp\xc4\x9btn\xc3\xbdch vazeb z cel\xc3\xa9ho v\xc3\xbdrobn\xc3\xadho procesu navrhovan\xc3\xa9ho za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad, tedy od technolog\xc5\xaf z v\xc3\xbdroby DPS a osazov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad, odborn\xc3\xadk\xc5\xaf ze zku\xc5\xa1ebn\xc3\xadch laborato\xc5\x99\xc3\xad EMC, servisn\xc3\xadch technik\xc5\xaf a dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch. V praxi to znamen\xc3\xa1 nejen &quot;se u\xc4\x8dit, se u\xc4\x8dit, se u\xc4\x8dit&quot;, ale i &quot;komunikovat, komunikovat, komunikovat&quot;, p\xc5\x99ij\xc3\xadmat kritiku a pou\xc4\x8dit se nejen z vlastn\xc3\xadch chyb.\r\n\r\nZ\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9brem snad jen jedna pozn\xc3\xa1mka:\r\n\r\n\r\n&quot;Jak se m\xc3\xa1 spr\xc3\xa1vn\xc4\x9b navrhovat deska plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xa9ho spoje?&quot;\r\n\r\n&quot;S citem. Je to nejen um\xc4\x9bleck\xc3\xa9 d\xc3\xadlo\xe2\x80\xa6&quot;\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2010 - ISBN 978-80-7300-266-4\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-309-8 (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\tZ\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad aspekty n\xc3\xa1vrhu desek sezn\xc3\xa1mit se s programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xadm mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ru AT89S52 v jazyce C. \r\n\r\nV\xc3\xbdklad je veden tak, \xc5\xbee p\xc5\x99ed dan\xc3\xbdmi p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklady probere pouze neovl\xc3\xa1daj\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nPro p\xc5\x99ehledn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dlen\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad je text rozd\xc4\x9blen do krat\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch kapitol. \xc4\x8cten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99 se maticov\xc3\xa9 kl\xc3\xa1vesnice, rozd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xadm programu do men\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch celk\xc5\xaf (modul\xc3\xa1rn\xc3\xadm programov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xadm), \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xadm LCD modulu, s\xc3\xa9riov\xc3\xbdmi sb\xc4\x9brnicemi Wire resp. SPI a I2C (konkr\xc3\xa9tn\xc4\x9b se pracuje s\xc2\xa0obvody TLC549 \xe2\x80\x93 A/D p\xc5\x99evodn\xc3\xadk a MCP23016 \xe2\x80\x93 expander pro 16 vstup\xc5\xaf/v\xc3\xbdstup\xc5\xaf), pou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xadm obvodu NE555 pro m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad odporu a kapacity mezip\xc5\x99evodem na \xc4\x8dasov\xc3\xbd interval nebo kmito\xc4\x8det. Jako posledn\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadklad je p\xc5\x99edvedena obsluha maticov\xc3\xa9ho displeje.\r\n\r\nPro dopln\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad a zp\xc5\x99ehledn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad textu byly do p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadlohy A za\xc5\x99azeny konstruk\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1vody p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadpravk\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou pou\xc5\xbeity v textu. P\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloha B informuje o instalaci v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9ho prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad KEIL \xc2\xb5Vision4 a p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadloha C je stru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbdm popisem tohoto prost\xc5\x99ed\xc3\xad, d\xc5\xafraz je kladen hlavn\xc4\x9b na vysv\xc4\x9btlen\xc3\xad pr\xc3\xa1ce s ladic\xc3\xadm modulem (debuggerem). \r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nPro v\xc3\xbdvoj program\xc5\xaf je pou\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1no v\xc3\xbdvojov\xc3\xa9 prost\xc5\x99edn\xc3\xad KEIL \xc2\xb5Vision4.\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2010 - ISBN 978-80-7300-264-0\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2010 - ISBN 978-80-7300-284-8 (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\tobsah Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-263-3', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nV dne\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xad dob\xc4\x9b je slovo &quot;INFORMACE&quot; u\xc5\xbe\xc3\xadv\xc3\xa1no doslova na ka\xc5\xbed\xc3\xa9m kroku. M\xc3\xa1lo kdo v\xc5\xa1ak v\xc3\xad, co tento pojem p\xc5\x99esn\xc4\x9b znamen\xc3\xa1. Kniha \r\n&quot;Informace o informaci&quot;\r\nv\xc3\xa1s s t\xc3\xadmto pojmem d\xc5\xafv\xc4\x9brn\xc4\x9b sezn\xc3\xa1m\xc3\xad, ani\xc5\xbe by si \xc4\x8dinila n\xc3\xa1roky na n\xc4\x9bjak\xc3\xa9 vysok\xc3\xa9 p\xc5\x99edchoz\xc3\xad znalosti. Pochopen\xc3\xad toho, \xc5\xbee &quot;informace&quot; je fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad pojem podobn\xc4\x9b jako &quot;energie&quot;, umo\xc5\xben\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xafm zcela nov\xc3\xbd \xc3\xbahel pohledu na v\xc4\x9bci, kter\xc3\xa9 se odehr\xc3\xa1vaj\xc3\xad kolem n\xc4\x9bj a to nejen v rovin\xc4\x9b technick\xc3\xa9, ale m\xc3\xa1 to tak\xc3\xa9 hlubok\xc3\xa9 dopady jak na pochopen\xc3\xad n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xbdch metod alternativn\xc3\xad medic\xc3\xadny, \xc3\xbalohy vody v na\xc5\xa1em \xc5\xbeivot\xc4\x9b i n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xa9 nov\xc3\xa9 pohledy filozofick\xc3\xa9 a n\xc3\xa1bo\xc5\xbeensk\xc3\xa9. Douf\xc3\xa1me, \xc5\xbee si toto dobrodru\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xad pozn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xa9 zejm\xc3\xa9na ve sv\xc3\xa9 druh\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti m\xc5\xaf\xc5\xbee vypadat jako Sci-fi, ale stoj\xc3\xad na fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch z\xc3\xa1kladech, nenech\xc3\xa1te uj\xc3\xadt. \r\n\r\nKniha je rozd\xc4\x9blena do dvou \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad. Prvn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st ozna\xc4\x8den\xc3\xa1 A se t\xc3\xbdk\xc3\xa1 teoretick\xc3\xbdch z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf a v\xc3\xbdkladu pojmu informace. Druh\xc3\xa1 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st ozna\xc4\x8den\xc3\xa1 B je pokusem o aplikaci pojmu informace jak do oblasti filozofie, tak i na n\xc4\x9bkter\xc3\xa9 jevy, kter\xc3\xa9 takto mohou b\xc3\xbdt vid\xc4\x9bny pod jin\xc3\xbdm \xc3\xbahlem. \r\n\r\nTeprve v polovin\xc4\x9b p\xc5\x99edminul\xc3\xa9ho stolet\xc3\xad byl p\xc5\x99ijat pojem &quot;energie&quot; jako nov\xc3\xbd fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad fenom\xc3\xa9n. Tento fenom\xc3\xa9n - energie - byl definov\xc3\xa1n jako &quot;schopnost konat pr\xc3\xa1ci&quot;. Pak byl vysloven i z\xc3\xa1kon o zachov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad energie. Po energii mechanick\xc3\xa9 a tepeln\xc3\xa9 byly postupn\xc4\x9b pozn\xc3\xa1v\xc3\xa1ny dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad druhy energi\xc3\xad a i vztahy mezi nimi. Od t\xc3\xa9 doby nastal exponenci\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1r\xc5\xafst technick\xc3\xbdch prost\xc5\x99edk\xc5\xaf umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88uj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch vz\xc3\xa1jemnou transformaci r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xbdch energi\xc3\xad, jako\xc5\xbe i prost\xc5\x99edk\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 tyto energie m\xc4\x9bnily v pr\xc3\xa1ci (stroje). T\xc3\xadm mohl \xc4\x8dlov\xc4\x9bk zn\xc3\xa1sobit v\xc3\xbdsledky sv\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8dinnosti a zalo\xc5\xbeil tak n\xc3\xa1stup siln\xc3\xa9ho r\xc5\xafstu techniky a v d\xc5\xafsledku toho i ekonomiky. \r\n\r\nVedle stroj\xc5\xaf, kter\xc3\xa9 m\xc4\x9bnily energii v pr\xc3\xa1ci, bylo nutn\xc3\xa9 soub\xc4\x9b\xc5\xben\xc4\x9b vyv\xc3\xadjet i za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xa1 umo\xc5\xbe\xc5\x88ovala kontrolu a \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad t\xc4\x9bchto stroj\xc5\xaf, n\xc4\x9bco co bylo p\xc5\x99i stroj\xc3\xadch, tj. p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstroje. Smyslem p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadstroj\xc5\xaf bylo a je d\xc3\xa1vat informaci o stavu sledovan\xc3\xa9ho syst\xc3\xa9mu, tj. p\xc5\x99em\xc4\x9b\xc5\x88ovat stav energie na informaci. Tak vznikaly manometry, teplom\xc4\x9bry, stavoznaky, Watt\xc5\xafv regul\xc3\xa1tor ot\xc3\xa1\xc4\x8dek aj. T\xc3\xadm za\xc4\x8dal rozvoj m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99ic\xc3\xad a regula\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad techniky a j\xc3\xad prov\xc3\xa1zej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad teorie regulace, kter\xc3\xa1 se pozd\xc4\x9bji stala z\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad kybernetiky.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad pou\xc5\xbeiteln\xc3\xbd telegraf zkonstruoval r. 1837 S.R.B. Morse a r. 1876 vynalezl A.G. Bell telefon. Bou\xc5\x99liv\xc3\xbd rozvoj t\xc4\x9bchto prost\xc5\x99edk\xc5\xaf si vy\xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dal i rozvoj teorie, kter\xc3\xa1 by pomohla optimalizovat p\xc5\x99enos zpr\xc3\xa1v. Claude Shannon byl jedn\xc3\xadm z t\xc4\x9bch, kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad se o to nejv\xc3\xadce zaslou\xc5\xbeili. Poprv\xc3\xa9 se pokusil definovat pojem &quot;informace&quot;. Poda\xc5\x99ilo se mu stanovit i zp\xc5\xafsob m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad mno\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xad informace t\xc3\xadm, \xc5\xbee definoval jednotku informace - bit (viz kap.1).\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\xc4\x8c\xc3\xa1st A\r\n\tCo je to informace?\r\n\tVlastnosti informace\r\n\tZ\xc3\xa1kladn\xc3\xad operace s informac\xc3\xad\r\n\tVztahy mezi hmotou, energi\xc3\xad a informac\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc4\x8c\xc3\xa1st B:\r\n\tInformace a \xc5\xbeivot\r\n\tInformace a pravda\r\n\tJin\xc3\xa9 vesm\xc3\xadry (p\xc5\x99evzato)\r\n\tJak funguje katalyz\xc3\xa1tor\r\n\tSymbol a ritu\xc3\xa1l z pohledu informace\r\n\tPam\xc4\x9b\xc5\xa5 vody\r\n\tInformace a medic\xc3\xadna\r\n\tInformace a B\xc5\xafh\r\n\tFrakt\xc3\xa1lov\xc3\xa9 nekone\xc4\x8dno\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - ve form\xc3\xa1tu DOC\r\n\tuk\xc3\xa1zka knihy - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF\r\n\r\n\tupdate - zat\xc3\xadm \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xbd nen\xc3\xad\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nRecenze lektor\xc5\xaf a reakce \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nOdkazy\r\n\r\n\tDal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad knihy autora se zobraz\xc3\xad kliknut\xc3\xadm na jeho jm\xc3\xa9no.\r\n\r\n\tInformace a vnit\xc5\x99n\xc3\xad struktura vesm\xc3\xadru\r\n\r\nSouvisej\xc3\xadc\xc3\xad \xc4\x8dl\xc3\xa1nky\r\n\tKybernetika a zm\xc4\x9bna paradigmatu (Pavel Bene\xc5\xa1)\r\n\tHodnota informace (Ji\xc5\x99\xc3\xad Stodola)\r\n\r\nD\xc4\x9bkujeme spole\xc4\x8dnostem, kter\xc3\xa9 podpo\xc5\x99ily vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad knihy:\r\n\twww.embitron.cz - EMBITRON s.r.o.\r\n\r\nOdkazy na homeopatii\r\n\tHomeopatie - homeopatick\xc3\xa1 poradna pro Prahu, Mnichovice, \xc5\x98\xc3\xad\xc4\x8dany a okol\xc3\xad.\r\n\tAkupunktura\r\n\ta dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad prvky tradi\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xadnsk\xc3\xa9 medic\xc3\xadny (MUDr. Kom\xc3\xa1rkov\xc3\xa1)\r\n\tAkupunktura pom\xc3\xa1h\xc3\xa1 v l\xc3\xa9\xc4\x8db\xc4\x9b mnoha onemocn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad. Publication(publisher='BEN - technick\xc3\xa1 literatura', optionals=Optionals(pub_place=None, ISBN='978-80-7300-256-5', description='obsah\r\n\tdownload\r\n\treakce\r\n\todkazy\r\n\tkeywords\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTato kniha by m\xc4\x9bla slou\xc5\xbeit jako praktick\xc3\xbd pomocn\xc3\xadk z\xc3\xa1jemc\xc5\xafm o oblast m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad a regulace, topen\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99stv\xc3\xad a vzduchotechniky. \r\n\r\nProblematika je rozebr\xc3\xa1na od z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf a\xc5\xbe po nuance konkr\xc3\xa9tn\xc3\xadch okruh\xc5\xaf, a proto je v hodn\xc3\xa1 jak pro laickou ve\xc5\x99ejnost, tak i pro odborn\xc3\xadky zm\xc3\xadn\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xbdch profes\xc3\xad. Najdete zde popis problematiky i praktick\xc3\xa9 \xc5\x99e\xc5\xa1en\xc3\xad zad\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad. Pro program\xc3\xa1tory \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddic\xc3\xadch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf je p\xc5\x99ipraven slovn\xc3\xad popis v logick\xc3\xa9m sledu tak, aby byl aplikovateln\xc3\xbd na r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 druhy \xc5\x99\xc3\xaddic\xc3\xadch syst\xc3\xa9m\xc5\xaf. Tato kniha nem\xc3\xa1 ambice kompletn\xc4\x9b popsat cel\xc3\xbd obor, z\xc3\xa1m\xc4\x9br byl vytvo\xc5\x99it &quot;pomocn\xc3\xadka do kapsy&quot; pro projektanty, mont\xc3\xa1\xc5\xben\xc3\xad techniky a softwarov\xc3\xa9 pracovn\xc3\xadky m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad a regulace.\r\n\r\nPrvn\xc3\xad kapitola se v\xc4\x9bnuje zdroj\xc5\xafm tepla. Jsou zde rozd\xc4\x9bleny podle typu paliva, v\xc3\xbdkonu, topen\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99sk\xc3\xa9ho zapojen\xc3\xad a n\xc3\xa1sledn\xc3\xa9 regulace. Setk\xc3\xa1te se zde se zapojen\xc3\xadm a regulac\xc3\xad jednotliv\xc3\xbdch kotl\xc5\xaf, tak se soustavou kotl\xc5\xaf v kask\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xadm \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad. N\xc3\xa1sledn\xc4\x9b jsou u jednotliv\xc3\xbdch celk\xc5\xaf pops\xc3\xa1ny podp\xc5\xafrn\xc3\xa9 okruhy, v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b mo\xc5\xbenost\xc3\xad zapojen\xc3\xad. \r\n\r\nDruh\xc3\xa1 kapitola je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na spot\xc5\x99ebi\xc4\x8d\xc5\xafm tepla a jejich \xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad. St\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbeejn\xc3\xadm t\xc3\xa9matem je detailn\xc3\xad popis ekvitermn\xc3\xad regulace v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b program\xc3\xa1torsk\xc3\xa9ho postupu, ale neomezuje se jen na toto. Obsahuje informace od individu\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad regulaci m\xc3\xadstnost\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99es d\xc3\xa1lkov\xc3\xbd dohled pomoc\xc3\xad GSM a\xc5\xbe po \xc3\xbavod do zaregulov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad pr\xc5\xaftoku radi\xc3\xa1tory.\r\n\r\nT\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad kapitola se v\xc4\x9bnuje oblasti vzduchotechniky a klimatizace. V\xc3\xbdchoz\xc3\xadm materi\xc3\xa1lem je typick\xc3\xa1 vzduchotechnick\xc3\xa1 sestava popsan\xc3\xa1 jako celek s dopln\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xadm detailn\xc3\xadch popis\xc5\xaf jednotliv\xc3\xbdch funk\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad v\xc4\x8detn\xc4\x9b mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xbdch program\xc3\xa1torsk\xc3\xbdch postup\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nPosledn\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st knihy je v\xc4\x9bnov\xc3\xa1na program\xc3\xa1tor\xc5\xafm, technik\xc5\xafm profese m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99en\xc3\xad a regulace. Najdete zde popis doporu\xc4\x8den\xc3\xbdch, praktick\xc3\xbdch a efektivn\xc3\xadch softwarov\xc3\xbdch a technologick\xc3\xbdch postup\xc5\xaf pro realizaci aplika\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadho softwaru, mont\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbee a o\xc5\xbeiven\xc3\xad za\xc5\x99\xc3\xadzen\xc3\xad.\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2010 - ISBN 978-80-7300-256-5\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-322-7 (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\n\r\nZDROJE TEPLA\r\n\tKotle na tuh\xc3\xa1 paliva, Neopom\xc3\xadj\xc3\xad ani jarn\xc3\xad setk\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad na Kamenci nebo v Horn\xc3\xadm Jelen\xc3\xad, kam si rovn\xc4\x9b\xc5\xbe mnoho n\xc3\xa1v\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bvn\xc3\xadk\xc5\xaf na\xc5\xa1lo cestu. Publikace je takov\xc3\xbdm mal\xc3\xbdm nahl\xc3\xa9dnut\xc3\xadm do historie \xe2\x80\x93 p\xc5\x99es v\xc5\xa1echna mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa1 r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa1 omezen\xc3\xad tehdej\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad doby se\xc2\xa0p\xc5\x99esto poda\xc5\x99ilo uspo\xc5\x99\xc3\xa1dat n\xc4\x9bkolik semin\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf, radioamat\xc3\xa9rsk\xc3\xbdch setk\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0sympozi\xc3\xad \xe2\x80\x93 jak to dokazuj\xc3\xad \xc4\x8detn\xc3\xa9 archivn\xc3\xad fotografie.\r\n\r\nDozv\xc3\xadte se n\xc4\x9bco zaj\xc3\xadmav\xc3\xa9ho o historii radioklubu v Holic\xc3\xadch a o lidech, kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad\xc2\xa0setk\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99ipravuj\xc3\xad. Nechyb\xc3\xad ani osobit\xc3\xa9 reakce n\xc3\xa1v\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9bvn\xc3\xadk\xc5\xaf a\xc2\xa0poutav\xc3\xa9 vypr\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xad od z\xc3\xa1stupc\xc5\xaf firem, kte\xc5\x99\xc3\xad jezd\xc3\xad do Holic pravideln\xc4\x9b obchodovat.\r\n\r\nMo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa1 budete r\xc3\xa1di, kdy\xc5\xbe se pozn\xc3\xa1te na fotografi\xc3\xadch ze setk\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad. Nebo v\xc3\xa1s zaujme n\xc4\x9bco z\xc2\xa0historie radioklubu v Holic\xc3\xadch - podobn\xc4\x9b jako v t\xc3\xa9 dob\xc4\x9b vznikalo mnoho jin\xc3\xbdch radioklub\xc5\xaf. Z d\xc5\xafvodu p\xc5\x99ehlednosti, srozumitelnosti a n\xc3\xa1zornosti jsou v\xc5\xa1echna elektrick\xc3\xa1 zapojen\xc3\xad a sch\xc3\xa9mata kreslena op\xc4\x9bt barevn\xc4\x9b, a dopln\xc4\x9bna mno\xc5\xbestv\xc3\xadm ilustra\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadch obr\xc3\xa1zk\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nTento druh\xc3\xbd d\xc3\xadl zahrnuje sedm t\xc3\xa9matick\xc3\xbdch celk\xc5\xaf:\r\n\tPrvn\xc3\xad celek &quot;Sp\xc3\xadna\xc4\x8de n\xc3\xadzk\xc3\xa9ho nap\xc4\x9bt\xc3\xad&quot; V prv\xc3\xa9 teoretick\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti je rozd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad detektor\xc5\xaf kovu podle nejr\xc5\xafzn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch hledisek a vysv\xc4\x9btlen\xc3\xad fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf funkce detektor\xc5\xaf se soust\xc5\x99ed\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xadm na t\xc5\x99i nejroz\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99en\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad druhy: z\xc3\xa1zn\xc4\x9bjov\xc3\xbd, balan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad a impulsn\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou pak v druh\xc3\xa9 praktick\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti knihy pops\xc3\xa1ny jako stavebn\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1vody. Kniha se tedy zab\xc3\xbdv\xc3\xa1 teori\xc3\xad a prax\xc3\xad stavby hleda\xc4\x8d\xc5\xaf kovov\xc3\xbdch p\xc5\x99edm\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xaf a poklad\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\nV prv\xc3\xa9 teoretick\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti je rozd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad detektor\xc5\xaf kovu podle nejr\xc5\xafzn\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch hledisek a vysv\xc4\x9btlen\xc3\xad fyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch z\xc3\xa1klad\xc5\xaf funkce detektor\xc5\xaf se soust\xc5\x99ed\xc4\x9bn\xc3\xadm na t\xc5\x99i nejroz\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad\xc5\x99en\xc4\x9bj\xc5\xa1\xc3\xad druhy: z\xc3\xa1zn\xc4\x9bjov\xc3\xbd, balan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad a impulzn\xc3\xad, kter\xc3\xa9 jsou pak v druh\xc3\xa9 praktick\xc3\xa9 \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1sti knihy pops\xc3\xa1ny jako stavebn\xc3\xad n\xc3\xa1vody. T\xc5\x99et\xc3\xad \xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad knihy tvo\xc5\x99\xc3\xad p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadlohy o konstrukci hledac\xc3\xadch c\xc3\xadvek a dal\xc5\xa1\xc3\xadch sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1st\xc3\xad, pot\xc5\x99ebn\xc3\xbdch pro experiment\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad stavbu a vylep\xc5\xa1ov\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad st\xc3\xa1vaj\xc3\xadc\xc3\xadch detektor\xc5\xaf kovu.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99ipad\xc3\xa1 v\xc3\xa1m kniha drah\xc3\xa1?\r\nVe skute\xc4\x8dnosti je tomu pr\xc3\xa1v\xc4\x9b naopak - kniha je velmi levn\xc3\xa1! Jak je to mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9?\r\n\r\nV \xc4\x8dasopisech a na Internetu se objevuje \xc5\x99ada n\xc3\xa1vod\xc5\xaf na r\xc5\xafzn\xc3\xa9 detektory kovu. \r\nV drtiv\xc3\xa9 v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1in\xc4\x9b se jedn\xc3\xa1 o analogov\xc3\xa9 konstrukce, kter\xc3\xa9 se bez profesion\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadho vybaven\xc3\xad t\xc3\xa9m\xc4\x9b\xc5\x99 nedaj\xc3\xad nastavit.\r\nA pokud se n\xc4\x9bkde objev\xc3\xad n\xc4\x9bjak\xc3\xbd n\xc3\xa1vod s procesorem, \r\nautor zpravidla po\xc5\xbeaduje n\xc4\x9bjakou cenu za naprogramovan\xc3\xbd procesor, v\xc4\x9bt\xc5\xa1inou v \xc5\x99\xc3\xa1du stokorun nebo des\xc3\xadtek Euro.\r\nNa\xc5\xa1e kniha obsahuje (krom\xc4\x9b jin\xc3\xbdch tip\xc5\xaf pro stavbu) dv\xc4\x9b \xc5\xa1pi\xc4\x8dkov\xc3\xa9 konstrukce poloprofesion\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xadch detektor\xc5\xaf na b\xc3\xa1zi procesoru.\r\nPro \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99e knihy jsou ZDARMA ke sta\xc5\xbeen\xc3\xad programy pro mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry (zkompilovan\xc3\xa9 programy i zdroj\xc3\xa1ky).\r\n\r\nA tak, i kdy\xc5\xbe to na prvn\xc3\xad pohled nevypad\xc3\xa1, v\xc3\xa1s vyjde kniha s programem pro mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r levn\xc4\x9bji, \r\nne\xc5\xbe kdybyste si postavili jin\xc3\xbd detektor podle n\xc3\xa1vodu, kter\xc3\xbd byste sice z\xc3\xadskali zdarma, ale za naprogramovan\xc3\xbd obvod byste zaplatili mnohem v\xc3\xadce.\r\nUr\xc4\x8dit\xc4\x9b si um\xc3\xadte spo\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadtat \xc3\xbasporu, kdy\xc5\xbe se rozhodnete si postavit procesorov\xc3\xa9 detektory dva (oba) nebo dokonce experimentovat se zdrojov\xc3\xbdm k\xc3\xb3dem.\r\n\r\nHistorie vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad\r\n\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2010 - ISBN 978-80-7300-220-6\r\n\t1. vyd\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad - 2011 - ISBN 978-80-7300-366-1 (elektronick\xc3\xa1 kniha ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF)\r\n\r\n\r\nStru\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xbd obsah\r\n\r\nI. \xc4\x8c\xc3\xa1st: Rozd\xc4\x9blen\xc3\xad a\xc2\xa0teorie\r\n\t\xc3\x9avod\r\n\tFyzik\xc3\xa1ln\xc3\xad z\xc3\xa1klady detektor\xc5\xaf kovu\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nII. \xc4\x8c\xc3\xa1st: Praktick\xc3\xa9 n\xc3\xa1vody\r\n\tZ\xc3\xa1zn\xc4\x9bjov\xc3\xbd detektor (BFO) \r\n\tBalan\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xad detektor (TR-IB) \r\n\tImpulzn\xc3\xad detektor (PI)\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nIII. \xc4\x8c\xc3\xa1st: C\xc3\xadvky detektor\xc5\xaf\r\n\tHledac\xc3\xad c\xc3\xadvky detektor\xc5\xaf \r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nP\xc5\x99\xc3\xadlohy\r\n\tZapojen\xc3\xad polovodi\xc4\x8dov\xc3\xbdch sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stek\r\n\tPou\xc5\xbeit\xc3\xa9 zkratky, Koup\xc4\x9b sou\xc4\x8d\xc3\xa1stek, Plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xa9 spoje, Kontakt na autora\r\n\tLiteratura, Rejst\xc5\x99\xc3\xadk\r\n\r\n\r\nDownload\r\n\r\n\tpodrobn\xc3\xbd obsah - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF \r\n\tuk\xc3\xa1zka knihy - ve form\xc3\xa1tu PDF\r\n\r\n\tupdate - zat\xc3\xadm \xc5\xbe\xc3\xa1dn\xc3\xbd nen\xc3\xad\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\tProgramy pro mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9ry a kli\xc5\xa1\xc3\xa9 plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf\r\n\tpozn.: Pokud jste je\xc5\xa1t\xc4\x9b nikdy neprogramovali mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r, \r\n\tdoporu\xc4\x8dujeme objedn\xc3\xa1n\xc3\xad naprogramovan\xc3\xbdch mikrokontrol\xc3\xa9r\xc5\xaf za rozumnou cenu p\xc5\x99\xc3\xadmo u autora knihy. A tak\xc3\xa9 plo\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xbdch spoj\xc5\xaf.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nRecenze lektor\xc5\xaf a reakce \xc4\x8dten\xc3\xa1\xc5\x99\xc5\xaf\r\n\r\n\tRecenze na
